loans.name: Paraxaj Group

texts.es:
El señor Alejandro es edad tiene 34 años de edad, cursó los tres años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos 2 de los cuales esta estudiando, se dedica a la producción de prendas, camisa y blusas, inicio este trabajo siendo operarios, y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia con su negocio, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quienes dedica a los oficios del hogar.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de teles, hilos, y botones de diferente colores y diseños, y mejorar su producción, espera en el futuro tener un maquiladora. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a La confección de faldas, playeras, ventas de playeras y pants.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 34 years old. He finished three years of primary school and has four children, two of which are in school. He makes garments, such as shirts and blouses. He started this work as a machine operator and now has more than ten years of experience in his business. He has the support of his wife, who is a homemaker.

He organized a group to request a loan, which he will use to improve his production and buy fabric, thread, and buttons of various sizes and designs. In the future, he hopes to have a sewing machine. The rest of the group members work making skirts and t-shirts or selling t-shirts and pants.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and buttons

loans.name: Zina Bibi Ussene Otomo

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Cidade da Matola, Província de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 2 frequentam a Escola e os outros não tem idade escolar. Fez a 7ª classe e parou por falta de condições financeiras pela parte dos pais, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 
	

É negociante há mais de 5 anos e tem um rendimento de cerca de 2.500.00mt, que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Nunca teve empréstimo noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (barrotes, chapas, cimento, pedra, areia, e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 18.000.00mt, e 25.000.00mt, aplicados na habitação. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Zina was born in the city of Matola in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  She is married and is the mother of four children, two of whom are in school.  The other two are not school-aged.  She studied through the seventh grade and stopped due to her parents' lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.

She has had a business for more than five years and makes almost 2,500 meticals, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account at the BIM bank.

She has never had a loan with another bank.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her third loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 15,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy construction materials for her home (beams, sheet metal, cement, stone, sand, etc.).  Her previous loans were for 18,000 and 25,000 meticals, which she put towards her home.  

She promises to make her payments on time.  In the future, she hopes to finish her home, for which she plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy beams, sheet metal, cement, stone, sand, etc., to continue work on her house.

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es: Gloria vive ( isla Guayaquil ) ella comenzó a vender comidas por que no le gustaba estar trabajando de vendedora ambulante. Haci que decidió ponerse un local donde vende comida y jugos. Trabaja todos los días con muchas ganas y esfuerzo. A futuro ella anhela arreglar su local. Con el préstamo comprara ( viveres como arroz, carnes, bebidas ).
texts.en:
Gloria lives in Isla, a section of Guayaquil. She began selling food, but she did not like working as a traveling street merchant. Therefore, she decided to open a shop where she could sell food and juices. Gloria works every day with great effort and determination. In the future, she would like to make repairs to her shop.

With this loan, Gloria will buy supplies such as rice, meats, and beverages.

loans.use: to buy rice, meats, and beverages.

loans.name: Victor Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Víctor tiene 52 años de edad, está casado y es padre de 5 hijos con edades de 8,10, 15, 17 y 19 años de edad, vive en una aldea de Esparta Atlántida.
Don Víctor  hace muchos años que  desarrolla sus habilidades en artesanías en madera. El ha recibido capacitación con una asociación Francesa quienes le han apoyado en la promoción y mercadeo de productos.
El tiene su propio taller de artesanías en madera como ser tallados, lápices, lapiceros, carritos, fruteros, llaveros etc., también  elabora muebles artesanos para sala, comedor, divisiones y otros con madera y mimbre. Este negocio lo comenzó con fondos propios y lo ha mantenido con los préstamos solicitados a ODEF, con los cuales ha podido hacer crecer el negocio y aumentar su clientela.
Actualmente solicita el onceavo  préstamos  que es por  7,000.00 Lempiras, para comprar madera que utiliza en la elaboración de artesanías. 
Su meta es tener más variedad de productos para atraer más clientes y también lograr exportar estos productos  que hace, para promocionarse e incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Sr. Victor is 52 years old, married, and the father of five children (ages 8, 10, 15, 18, and 19). He lives in the neighborhood of Esparta Atlántida.

Don Victor has spent many years developing his skills in making wooden handicrafts. He received training from a French organization that supports the promotion and marketing of these products. Victor has his own craft workshop where he makes carvings, pencils, mechanical pencils, wheelbarrows, fruit bowls, key rings, and other items. He also produces furniture such as benches, dining sets, room dividers, and other items made of wood and wicker.

Victor started started his business with his own money and maintained his enterprise with the loans he requested from ODEF. The loans have enabled him to grow his business and expand his customer base. He is currently requesting his eleventh loan in the amount of 7,000 HNL in order to buy wood for making his handicrafts. His goal is to have a wider variety of products so that he can attract more customers. He also wants to export his products so that he can promote himself and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Strengthen his retail commerce (buy mineral water, cookies, Kleenex, etc.)

loans.name: Juliana

texts.es: La señora Juliana desea invertir en su negocio y comprar más variedad de mercancía como es, vasija de plástico, sartenes y cobijas, ya que al tener estos productos sus ganancias serán mejor. Solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de dichos productos. Doña Juliana aparte de su negocio, es empleada de una fabrica en el aria de producción este ingreso le ayuda con los gastos familiares. Tiene dos hijos de mediana edad que están bajo su responsabilidad, y desea darles los mejor para su futuro. Es por eso que solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y así obtener más ganancias.
texts.en: Sra. Juliana wants to invest in her business and buy a wider variety of merchandise such as plastic containers, frying pans, and blankets so that she can improve her earnings.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of these products.  In addition to her business, Doña Juliana works at a factory in the production unit so that she can earn income to help with the family expenses.  She has two pre-teen children who are her responsibility, so she wants to provide them with the best for their future.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to invest in her business and generate more income as a result.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as household appliances and shoes.

loans.name: Choquinom Group

texts.es:
Doña Isabel es una persona de 38 años de edad, no tuvo a oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 7 hijos y todos están estudiando, se dedica a oficios domésticos, como también a la agricultura, siembra de verduras u hortalizas, lleva 6 años de experiencia con este oficio, inicio sembrando solo una cuerda de terreno, y actualmente quiere aumentar su producción.

Decide entonces, organizar un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que servirá como capital de trabajo para preparar el terreno para el cultivo y la compra de semillas y así aumentar la producción de verduras, ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la agricultura, a la siembra de hortalizas y una de ellas se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno. Esperan con la inversión que hacen, aumentar sus ganancias y mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Doña Isabel is 38 and didn't have the opportunity to go to school.  She has 7 children, all of whom are in school.  She does work around the house and also works in agriculture, growing vegetables.  She has done this work for 6 years.  She started with only a small amount of land, and now she wants to increase her production.

Since then, they have organized a group to request a loan that will serve as working capital to prepare land for their crops, to buy seeds, and to increase the production of vegetables.  She has the support of her husband, who also works in agriculture.  The other members of the group also work in agriculture, growing vegetables and raising cattle.  They hope that, with the investment they make, they can improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds and to prepare the land.

loans.name: Duo La Familia Group

texts.es: Duo la Familia La señora Lesbia de 21 años de edad soltera tiene un hijo es una persona muy luchadora que esta luchando por sacar adenlante a su hijo ella juntamente con su familia se dedican al cultivo de lechuga rabano etc ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de abono para el cultivo ya que por esta epoca es cuando mas lo nececitan para la plaga. espera que kiva le pueda ayudar con el prestamo solicitado.
texts.en:
Sra. Lesbia is 21 years old, single, and has one child. She is a very determined individual and strives to get ahead on behalf of her son. Lesbia and her family work together in growing lettuce, radishes, and other crops. She is requesting a loan to buy compost for her crops since now is the time when she needs supplies to combat diseases.

Lesbia hopes that Kiva can help her with the loan she requested.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Manuela Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Manuela Cristina, tiene 39 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría, inicio este negocio como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 12 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para compra hilos de diferentes clases y colores, para mejorar su producción  de tejidos, ya que en el futuro espera tener un negocio grande y con trabajadores, para mejorar la condición de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Manuela Cristina is 39 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study. Manuela has three children who are in school. She is a weaver and started in this line of work as an operator. Manuela now has 12 years of experience.

She is requesting a loan that will be used to buy threads of different types and colors so that she can improve her production of woven items. In the future, she hopes to have a larger business and employees so that she can improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials for weaving.

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
El señor Sabino solicita un crédito, porque le esta haciendo falta una losa al frente de su casa, y no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejorar, y comprar el material que es cemento, arena y varilla. 
Don Sabino recibe una pensión por medio del gobierno y también tiene un pequeño negocio de abarrotes, estos son los ingresos que tiene para su familia. 
Desea mejorar su patrimonio y tener un lugar mas seguro para el y su esposa. 
El señor Sabino y su esposa, ya han tenido un crédito con KIVA el cual fue para mejorar su vivienda y esperan contar con su cooperación en este préstamo.
texts.en:
Sr. Sabino is requesting a loan because he lacks a concrete slab in front of his house. He does not have the necessary funds to make this improvement, but he needs to buy materials such as cement, sand, and metal rods. Don Sabino receives a pension from the government and he also operates a small grocery business. These sources of income enable him to support his family.

Sabino wants to improve his property so that he can have a more secure home for himself and his wife. They have received a Kiva loan before for home improvements, so they hope to receive cooperation again with this loan.

loans.use: to lay down a concrete slab in front of his home.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба замужем и любящая мать одного ребенка. Более 21 года она занимается купле- продажей обуви. Она очень добрая и трудолюбивая женщина, которая успешно расширила свой бизнес и в дальнейшем старается стать успешной. Махбуба хотела бы получить займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки летней обуви. Она очень благодарна всем, кто поддержит её в развитии бизнеса.
texts.en:
Mahbuba is married and the loving mother of one child.  She has been buying and selling shoes for more than 21 years.  She is a very kind and hardworking woman who successfully managed to expand her business and is determined to continue to be successful in the future.

Mahbuba would like to receive a loan of 4,000 somoni for the purchase of summer shoes.  She sincerely thanks everyone who is helping her develop her business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal shoes.

loans.name: Nasser

texts.en:
Nasser is a 41-year-old married man from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a father of three.

Nasser is a proud owner of a small grocery store. He is requesting a loan of 1500 JD to purchase more goods for his store.

Nasser is looking to improve his business and increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his grocery store

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a 32-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Eman is doing milk and cheese and is requesting a loan of 1,000 JD to purchase materials needed.

Eman is looking to improve her family's living conditions and expand her income.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed to make cheese and milk

loans.name: Yusra

texts.en:
Yusra is a 52-year-old married woman from Madaba, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Yusra is doing cheese and dairy products. She is requesting a loan of 900 JD to purchase milk for her business.

Yusra is looking to improve her family's living conditions and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase milk for making cheese

loans.name: Nisreen

texts.en:
Nisreen is a 36-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Nisreen is selling clothes. She is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Nisreen is looking to expand her business and open a shop.

loans.use: To purchase clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a 56-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and a mother of seven children.

Amneh is looking to improve her family's living conditions and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Sojida

texts.ru: Сочида женщина 47 лет,которая уже девять лет , как занимается продажей детской одежды.Она за товаром ездит сама в Истаравшан,два раза в неделю.Торгует на вещевом рынке Худжанда.У неё свои постоянные клиенты, которые часто покупают у неё товар.Сочида решила провезти лечение своих зубов, но для этого она не хочет использовать средства из своего товарооборота, поэтому обратилась к нам получить для этой цели кредит.Сочида очень пунктуальная и честная женщина, которая сотрудничает с Арвандом второй год.
texts.en:
Sojida is 47 years old. She has been selling children's clothes for nine years. She goes to the city of Istaravshan two times per week to get the goods, which she sells at the Khujand clothing market. She has her regular customers who often buy her goods. 
Sojida decided to get her teeth fixed; however, she would not like to use the working capital. That is why she turned to us for a loan. 
Sojida is a very punctual and honest woman who has been collaborating with MDO Arvand for over a year.

loans.use: to get her teeth fixed

loans.name: Amar

texts.en:
Amar is a 53-year-old married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Amar has a beauty salon and she is requesting a loan of 1,800 JD to purchase new furniture for her salon.

Amar is looking to improve her family income and increase their living standards.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her salon

loans.name: Nadiah

texts.en:
Nadiah is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. Thus, the man in the photo is her husband.

Nadiah is a 35-year-old married woman from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Nadiah is a tailor who has a small workshop at her home. She is requesting a loan of 1,200 JD to purchase a modern sewing machine.

Nadiah is looking to establish a larger workshop for her business so that she can increase her sales volume and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase a modern sewing machine

loans.name: Neama

texts.en:
Neama is a 59-year-old widow from Al Nasser, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children.

Neama is a tailor who works from her home and is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase a sewing machine.

Neama is looking to establish a workshop for her business .

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Alijon

texts.ru: Более 7 лет Аличон занимается купле- продажей продтоваров и промтоваров. Он очень старательный человек всегда двигается вперед, чтобы развивать свой бизнес. Аличон женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Начинал свой бизнес с мизерного капитала, вначале его оборотный капитал составил 100$ США, в настоящее время его бизнес увеличился до 5600 Сомони. Аличон хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки промтоваров и продтоваров с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Alijon has been reselling foodstuffs and household supplies for over 7 years. He is a very diligent person who always does his utmost to develop his business. Alijon is married and is raising four children. He started his business with a scanty capital, and the working capital totaled $100. He has grown his business over the years, and today the working capital totals 5,600 Somoni. Alijon would like to receive a loan in the amount of 3,000 Somoni to buy household supplies and foodstuffs in order to replenish his working capital. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy food and household supplies

loans.name: Anar

texts.ru:
Анар 58 лет, замужем, воспитала 3 детей.  С 1994 года Анар занимается полеводством  и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Анар в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  3 головы дойных коров и 15 овец. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анар обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Анар планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Anar is 58 years old, married, and raised 3 children. She started her business with 10,000 som (KGS) and has been engaged in crop-farming and animal husbandry since 1994. Thanks to Anar's dedicated work, today her farms counts 3 cows and 15 sheep. 
In order to further develop her business, Anar has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to purchase additional livestock. Anar is planning on investing the earnings from the loan into further business expansion.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Fidelia

texts.es:
La señora Fidelia tiene 61 años de edad, tiene tres hijos y siempre ha sido una madre soltera. Desde la edad de 15 años ella trabajo en la capital del país como empleada domestica por más de 20 años para brindarles todo lo necesario a sus padres. Tiempo en el cual ella aprendió a administrar su dinero y con el tiempo mando a construir su propia casa de adobe. 

A pesar de que hace algunos años ella sufrió un accidente y se fracturo un pie, siempre ha luchado y  aportar a su familia instalo una tienda de productos de primera necesidad. Ella realiza los pedidos a sus proveedores y se los llevan a su casa todos los sábados y así surte su tienda.

La señora Fidelia solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar más productos y surtir la tienda para ofrecer más a sus clientes, obteniendo ingresos económicos para la familia que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida, la de sus hijos y nietos, pues el negocio es rentable. Ella desea mejorar continuamente su tienda, repellar su vivienda y ayudar a sus nietos con el estudio.
texts.en:
Fidelia is 61 years old. She has three children and always has been a single mother. Since the age of 15, she has worked in the capital of the country as a domestic employee for more than twenty years to provide all that is necessary to her parents. During that time, she learned how to manage her money and, with time, she ordered the building of her own adobe house.

Although some years ago she suffered an accident and fractured her foot, she has always fought and to contribute to her family, she started a store selling basic necessity products. She made orders with her suppliers and they made deliveries to her house on Saturdays and, in this way, she stocked her store.

Fidelia is requesting a loan from Fundacion Campo to purchase more products and to stock the store to offer more to her customers. Obtaining income for the family allows her to improve her quality of life and that of her children and grandchildren since the business is profitable. She wishes to improve her store continuously, repair her house and help her grandchildren with their education.

loans.use: to purchase more products and stock her store in order to offer more to her customers.

loans.name: Ramona Fernanda

texts.es:
La señora Ramona Fernanda tiene 43 años de edad, curso los 6 años de educación primaria, se dedica al comercio a la venta de calzado de todo tamaño, inicio este negocio como operario y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de materiales para calzado, para que así pueda mejorar su producción y sus ganancias, en el futuro espera contar con locales grandes.
texts.en:
Ramona Fernanda is 43 years old. She completed six years of primary school. She is dedicated to the trade of selling shoes of all sizes. She began this business as an operator and, until now, has two years experience.

She is requesting a loan that will be used to purchase materials for shoes so that she can improve her production and her earnings. In the future, she hopes to rely on large shops.

loans.use: to purchase materials for shoes.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Victor de 47 años vive ( libertad ecuador) el decidió este negocio para incrementar su situación económica y de esa manera sustentar a su familia. Trabaja todos los días con mucho esfuerzo y ganas solo. A futuro anhela un vehiculo para movilizarce . con el préstamo comprara ( lavacaras cestos )
texts.en: Victor is 47 years old. He lives in Libertad, Ecuador. He decided on this business to increase his economic situation and, in this manner, support his family. He works every day with a lot of effort and desire only. In the future, he longs for a vehicle to get around in. With the loan, he will buy baskets and plastic tubs.

loans.use: lavacaras

loans.name: Silvia Beatriz

texts.es: Silvia de  43   años vive (suburbio guayaquil). Ella escogió este negocio que es la venta de ropa por motivo de MEJORAR SU SITUACION ECONOMICA . De esta manera ella saca adelante a sus hijos . trabaja todos los días sola. A futuro anhela darle una buena educación a sus hijos y mejorar su negocio. Con el  préstamo co)mprara ( jeans blusas sabanas etc ).
texts.en: Silvia is 43 years old. She lives in a suburb of Guayaquil. She chose this business which is selling clothes in order to improve her economic situation. In this manner she gets her children ahead. She works every day alone. In the future, she longs for a good education for her children and to improve her business. With the loan, she will buy jeans, blouses, sheets, etc.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, shorts, pants, and sheets.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Более 16 лет она занимается шитьем мужских национальных халатов (чапан). Гулсара покупает материалы из центрального рынка города, затем дома шьет национальные халаты и потом продает на рынке за выгодную цену. Она начала свой бизнес с купле- продажи одежды. Гулсара запрашивает займ в размере 8000 Сомони для покупки тканей  и швейной машинки. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Gulsara is married and is a loving mother of three children. She has been sewing national coats for men (chapan coats) for over 16 years. Gulsara buys all the necessary materials at the central city market, sews the national coats at home and sells them at the market for a profitable price. She started her business from reselling clothes. Gulsara is asking for a loan in the amount of 8,000 Somoni to purchase fabrics and a sewing machine. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabrics and a sewing machine

loans.name: Freddy Fernando

texts.es: Freddy de 32 años vive ( libertad ecuador ). El escogió esta profecion porque la mayoría de su familia lo hace y tienen clientela fija y variable en la comprar de puertas, armarios etc. Trabaja todos los días solo. A futuro el anhela tener un local grande . con el préstamo comprara ( sillas mesas ).
texts.en: Freddy is 32 years old. He lives in Libertad, Ecuador. He chose this profession because the majority of his family does it and they have fixed and variable customers who buy doors, armoirs, etc. He works every day alone. In the future, he longs to have a large shop. With the loan he will buy chairs and tables.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Celentina De La Luna

texts.es: Celentina  de 41 años vive (duran ecuador). Ella decdio ponerse un salón de belleza por que desde pequeña aprendió esa profecion . trabaja todos los días con mucho esfuerzo y ganas. A futuro anhela tener su casa arreglada. Con el préstamo comprara ( material de belleza  ).
texts.en: Celentina is 41 years old. She lives in Duran, Ecuador. She decided to start a beauty salon because since she was little, she learned this profession. She works every day with a lot of effort and desire. In the future, she longs to have her home fixed. With the loan, she will buy beauty products.

loans.use: to purchase tools and an iron.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: Salvador es originario  de la comarca San José de los remate-Teustepe, casado, padre de 4 hijos  de  21,20, 18 y 16 años de edad todos estudian, el piensa apoyarlos hasta donde pueda, su actividad es la agricultura se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz. Inicio a trabajar con su padres a la edad de 10 años sembrando para el consumo propio pero con el tiempo decidió sembrar para la comercialización obteniendo ganancias propias que utilizo para comprar ganado. su padre le heredo 9 manzanas de tierra que trabaja con sus hijos en la siembra de frijol que vende a otros comerciantes de otra zona, cuenta con otros ingreso que es la venta de terneros. Le  gustaría  ofrecer sus productos en otros lugar para vender a mejor precio, tiene como expectativa cultivar otros productos como tomate, chiltoma y sandias de riego. El solicito el préstamo para terminar de construir un pozo, el cual le ayudara para extraer agua para riego del cultivo. Sus planes futuros es comprar tierra para sembrar 6 manzanas de frijol y maíz.
texts.en: Salvador is a native of the region of San Jose de los Remate-Teustepe. He is married, father to four children who are 21, 20, 18 and 16 years old. All are students. He thinks he will support them as long as he can. His activity is farming. He is dedicated to planting beans and maize. He began to work with his parents at the age of 10 planting for their own consumption, but over time, he decided to farm commercially obtaining his own income that he used to purchase cattle. His father left him 9 squares of land that he works with his children planting beans that he sells to other traders in the area. He counts on other income from the sale of calves. He would like to offer his products in other places to sell at a better price. His expectation is to cultivate other products like tomato, peppers and watermelon. He is requesting the loan to finish building a well, which will help him to extract water to irrigate his crops. His future plan is to buy land to plant 6 squares of beans and maize.

loans.use: to finish building a well.

loans.name: Umar

texts.ru: Умар трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена работает учителем. Умар занимается предоставлением услуг такси по городу. Он имеет собственную автомашину марки «Nexia». Умар запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для ремонта своего автомобиля.
texts.en: Umar is an industrious and kind person. He is married and is raising two children. His wife is a teacher. Umar provides taxi services in the city. He owns a Nexia car. Umar is asking for a loan in the amount of 4,000 Somoni to get his car repaired.

loans.use: To repair his car

loans.name: Odinakhon

texts.ru: Одинахон трудолюбивая и целеустремленная женщина. Она разведена, на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Чтобы содержать свою семью, более 15 лет она занимается купле- продажей скота. В бизнесе ей помогают дети. Разводит крупный рогатый скот, также продает молоко и сливки. Этим бизнесом она обеспечивает свою семью. Ей также помогает брат, который на данный момент находится в России. Одинахон запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота. А также на остальную сумму хочет купить холодильник для хранения молока.
texts.en: Odinakhon is an industrious and goal-oriented woman. She is divorced and is raising two children. In order to provide for her family, Odinakhon has been engaged in cattle resale for over 15 years. Her children help her. Odinakhon raises cattle and sells milk and cream. Thanks to her business, she is able to provide for her family. Odinakhon's brother, who is currently in Russia, also helps her. Odinakhon is requesting a loan in the amount of 5,000 Somoni to purchase cattle. She would like to use the rest of the money to buy a fridge to store the milk in.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Misirkhan

texts.ru:
Misirkhan 54 qoda. On jenat jivet v Fizuli regione i imeyet 4 detey. MIsirkhan ochen semeyniy chelovek. On uje 13 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov dlya proizvodstva molochnix produktov. Misirkhan nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi, on xochet uvelichit kolichestvo korov chtobi uludshit svoy bizness i proizvodstvo molochnix produktov. Misirkhan zanimayetsya proizvodstvom raznix molochnix produktov kak yogurt, kefir, tvorog i t.d. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom , pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda. 


Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)
texts.en:
Misirkhan is a married 54-year-old man with 4 children. He lives in the Fuzuli region. He is a very family oriented person. Misirkhan has been engaged in animal husbandry for 13 years. He raises cows to produce dairy products. Misirkhan needs AZN 2,000 to purchase cows in order to improve his business and increase milk production. Misirkhan is engaged in the production of various dairy products, such as yogurts, kefir, cottage cheese, etc. He is an IDP person coming originally from the city of Fuzuli. 
An Internally Displaced Person (IDP) is a person who was forced to flee from his/her home because of an armed conflict, violence, human rights violation, natural disasters or other catastrophes; however, as compared to a refugee, IDP remains within his/her country's borders (source: the UN's Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Burul

texts.ru:
Бурул 54 года, замужем, воспитала 3 детей.  С 1998 года Бурул занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Бурул, в ее хозяйстве имеется  3,60 га орошаемой земли с фасолью, что позволяет иметь сезонный доход. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бурул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку  семян, удобрений и горюче - смазочных материалов. Доходы от кредита Бурул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Burul is 54 years old, married, and raised 3 children. She started her business with 10,000 som (KGS), and has been engaged in crop-farming since 1998. Thanks to Burul's dedicated work, today she owns a 3.60 - ha plot of land under irrigation that brings in seasonal income from raising beans. 
In order to further develop her business, Burul has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase seeds, fertilizers, fuel and lubricants. Burul is planning on investing the earnings from the loan into further business expansion.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Adolf

texts.en:
Adolf is a 31-year-old married man with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda.

He has owned a retail shop for six years now. He started with 300,000 Ugandan shillings, but now the business is worth 1,300,000 Ugandan shillings. 

Adolf's challenge is customers not paying on time. His dream is educating his children and expanding his business into new markets.

Apart from the retail business, Adolf also has a business in the transport sector. However, his taxi has a mechanical problem.

Adolf needs this loan to buy tyres and repair his vehicle.

loans.use: to buy tyres and repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 35 years old and married with two children. 

She sells eggs and water to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and has employed one person. 

To earn extra income she also farms. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Lucy has been able to improve her business and hopes to expand her business in the future. 

Lucy has applied for 50,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy more eggs and bottled water to sell.

loans.use: to buy eggs and bottled water to sell.

loans.name: Mamuna

texts.en:
Mamuna lives in Yei. She is 37 years old, married, and has three children who are all still in school.  

She sells fish, and has been in the business for five years. 

Mamuna heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her second loan from BRAC. 

She has requested a loan of 600 SDG in order to purchase fish. 

She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Maria Dominga

texts.es:
La señora Maria Dominga es casada, tiene 41 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 4 están estudiando, se dedica al comercio, a la venta de cortes típicos, lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderías,ya que quiere ampliar su negocio y sus ventas, y en consecuencia su condición de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Domingo is married, 41 years old, never had the opportunity to study, and has 8 children 4 of which are studying. For ten years she has been selling local clothing.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise since she wants to grow her business and increase sales to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy merchandise/ local clothing

loans.name: Josefa  Maria

texts.es: Josefa de 53 años vive (libertad Guayaquil ). Ella decidió vender cosas para el hogar junto a su esposo para mantener una buena situación económica . comenzó vendiendo poco a poco. Fue aumentando  sus ventas y hasta la actualidad le va bien. Trabaja con muchas ganas y fuerzas todos los días por los pueblos junto a su esposo (aparece con su esposo en la foto). A futuro anhela mejorar su calidad de vida. Con el préstamo comprara ( ollas pantalones etc .)
texts.en: Josefa is 53 years old and lives in libertad Guayaquil. She decided to sell things for her home with her husband to help financially. She started by selling little by little. Her sales began to increase and now her business is going very well. She works with a drive and enthusiasm every day in close by towns with her husband (she is with her husband in the photo.) In the future she wants to improve the quality of her life. She will use the loan to buy (pots, pants, etc.)

loans.use: buy mattresses, pots, etc

loans.name: Betty Carmen

texts.es: betty de 35 años vive ( libertad ecuador ). Ella escogió este negocio que es la venta de ropa por motivo de QUE NECESITABA AUMENTAR la situación económica  en su hogar. De esta manera ella saca adelante a sus hijos . trabaja todos los días sola. A futuro anhela darle una buena educación a sus hijos. Con el préstamo comprara ( jeans blusas sabanas etc ).
texts.en: Betty is 35 years old and lives in Libertad, Ecuador. She chose the sale of clothing as her business since SHE NEEDED TO IMPROVE her financial situation. This allows her to maintain her children. She works alone every day. In the future she wishes to offer her children an education. She will use the loan to buy (jeans, blouses, sheets, etc.)

loans.use: buy blouses, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es: Don Pedro es de la comarca llamada el Pueblito-Boaco, casado, de 55 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos los cuales tienen su vida independiente. El  inicio su actividad agrícola a los 20 años de edad trabajando como peón para poder ir ahorrando y comprarse dos terneras las cuales mas adelante se multiplicaron, posteriormente compro su pedazo de tierra donde trabaja y se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol que vende en la misma comarca. También tiene como otros ingresos  para ayudarse la cosecha de naranja que realiza cada año de enero a marzo. Pedro quiere este crédito para comprar el abono y los insumos que necesitara para la siembra del maíz teniendo la esperanza de que le ira bien en su cosecha y con la ganancia espera  sembrar  café.
texts.en: Mr. Pedro is from a region called Pueblito-Boaco, married, 55 years old, has 3 children who live independently. He started his agricultural work 20 years ago as a farmer to start saving to buy two calfs which later reproduced. Afterwards, he purchased a piece of land where he works now to grow corn and beans and sells in the same region. He also has an orange crop to help him out financially and works on it every year from January to March. Pedro is requesting this loan to buy fertilizer and materials he needs to grow corn in hopes that his crop will grow well and use the income to grow coffee beans.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and materials he needs to grow corn.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is a 31-year-old married man with 3 children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has been running a retail shop for the last 3 years. His challenges are price fluctuations, inflation, customers not paying on time and high rental costs. His dreams are educating his children, building a permanent home, moving his business to a more permanent location and expanding it into new markets.

Charles needs this loan to buy a generator and general merchandise like sugar for resale.

loans.use: to buy a generator and general merchandise like sugar for reasale

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent is a 42-year-old married man with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has owned a retail shop for the last 5 years. His starting capital was 300,000 shillings but now its 2,000,000 shillings. However, his challenge is high transportation costs. His dream is educating his children and expanding his business to a depot for sodas.

Innocent needs this loan to buy sodas for resale.

loans.use: to buy sodas for resale

loans.name: Violeta

texts.en:
Violeta is 45 years old. She lives in Nor Artagers village with her husband and three children. Violeta works at the local school as a teacher. Her husband is the director of the same school. Violota's son is 22 years old, and her two daughters are 19 and 20 years old. The three children are students. 

Besides the work at school, Violeta and her husband are involved in agriculture: cattle breeding and land cultivating. Violeta wants to develop her farm and start land cultivation, for which she needs sufficient investments. With the requested loan, she plans to purchase a cow, seeds and 30 bags of fertilizer.

Violeta will increase her income from agriculture, which will help her to cover her children's educational fees and insure stable futures for them.

loans.use: to pay for a cow, fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a 32-year-old business man and he is married to Eveline, a business lady. They are blessed with one child aged one year. He has been running a computer college for the past eight years with the monthly income of 10,000 KES, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan from KADET Ltd after being introduced by a staff person. Patrick will use the loan to buy computers and printers for his college. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his child. His hopes and dreams are to employ more teachers and introduce other subjects.

loans.use: to buy computers and printers for his college

loans.name: Glorious

texts.en:
Glorious is 31 years old and a mother of two children. She operates a tailoring shop in Malindi town and has been in the business for the last two years. She earns a monthly profit of 20,000 KES. 

She was introduced to KADET Ltd by one of our credit officers and she is applying for her fourth loan of 100,000 KES. She intends to use the loan to purchase additional clothing material for her business. 

She will save the anticipated profit and help take care of her children. In the future, Glorious hopes to grow her tailoring shop as well as venture into other businesses so as to improve her financial status.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothing material for her business.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José, de 66 años de edad es de la comunidad de Tomatoyita- Teustepe,  casado, tiene 5 hijos los cuales  todos están casado. El inicio a trabajar en la agricultura a los 13 años de edad al lado de su papa quien en aquel entonces  le dio 4 manzanas  de tierra para que trabajara pero con el tiempo y producto de su esfuerzo hoy José  posee un poco mas, el se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz que una vez cosechado lo vende en la misma comarca. Solicita este crédito para comprar los insumos y pagar la mano de obra  para limpiar el terreno donde hará la siembra de frijol teniendo la  seguridad que con este crédito podrá realizar  todo su trabajo. Con la ganancia que obtenga una vez cancelado el crédito  quiere comprarse unos terneros buscando otras oportunidades de salir adelante
texts.en: José is 66 years old, from the Tomatoyita- Teustepe community, married, and has 5 children who are all married. He began working in agriculture with his father when he was 13 years old. His father gave him 4 blocks of land and over time with hard work now owns a little more. He grows beans and corn which are sold once harvested in the same area. He is requesting the loan to buy materials and pay for labor to clean the land where he will sew the seeds. He will have confidence in having a fruitful crop with this loan. After paying off his loan he will use the profits to buy more land to have more opportunities in being successful.

loans.use: buy materials and pay for labor to maintain his crops

loans.name: Kakala

texts.en:
Kakala is 49 years old, married and a mother of five children. She sells coconuts in Malindi town and has been in the business for the last ten years. She earns a monthly profit of 20,000 KES.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers, and she is applying for her third loan of 80,000 KES. She intends to use the loan to purchase additional coconuts for sell. She will save the anticipated profit and help pay school fees for her children. 

In the future, Kakala hopes to continue with her business and hopes to grow it in order to improve her financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconuts for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Yei. She sells from a food stall and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children, all of whom are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase beans and maize to sell. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is 35 years old and married to Margaret. They are blessed with two children, aged 11 and 6 years.  He is a boda boda (motorcycle) operator, a business he started two years ago, and he earns a monthly income of about KES 10,500. 

He has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase another motorbike. The anticipated profit will help him pay school fees for his children. He dreams of having a big business as well as a good family. This is his first loan.

loans.use: To purchase another motorbike.

loans.name: Jamila Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Jamila bibi is a mother of four children - three sons and one daughter. Her eldest son is a motor mechanic and works in a motor workshop where he repairs vehicles. He financially contributes to the family from his earnings. Her youngest son and a daughter are getting an education from a nearby school. Jamila herself is a very caring lady who spends her time at home and does household chores. She gives full time to her family and takes care of them. 

Her husband is a very honest businessman. He runs a business of selling fruit. He sells fresh seasonal fruits from his four-wheeled cart by visiting different areas and streets. He handles a good clientele and makes good sales.  He buys fruits from the fruit market at reasonable rates and sells for a profit.
  
Jamila has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will invest the loan in the buying of fresh seasonal fruits in larger quantities for reselling. Jamila is hopeful about the positive financial growth of her husband’s business after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruits for reselling.

loans.name: Pantaleo

texts.en: Pantaleo is a hardworking married man with three children, living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He deals in the sale of food and this has enabled him to buy land where he grows some crops. His challenge is price fluctuation and his dreams are educating his children and diversifying his business. Pantaleo needs the money to buy Irish potatoes, bananas and maize for resale.

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes, bananas and maize for resale.

loans.name: Vrezh

texts.en:
Vrezh is a 40-year-old entrepreneur from Armavir. He trades with clothing and shoes in the city market. Vrezh lives with his 36-year-old wife, Anna, and three children: 13 and 15-year-old daughters and a 14-year-old son.
 
Current income from the business is barely enough to cover the family's costs, so Vrezh wants to increase the inventory variety and develop his business. With the help of this loan, Vrezh will purchase crystal ware. This will allow Vrezh to increase the sales and get more business income, which he plans to invest in further development of the business.

loans.use: to pay for crystal ware.

loans.name: Estefana

texts.es:
Estefana,tiene 56 años de edad tiene 4 hijos actual mente vive con dos de ellos en su casa,doña estefana tenia tan solo 11 años de edad cuando empeso a trabajar con su madre haciendo limpiesa en las casas, ya que no abia suficiente ingresos y como ella era la mayor de sus hermanos luego trabajo con su padre de dependiente de mostrador atendiendo un almacen de ropa, luego la contrataron en un almacen de telas y posterior mente como ayudante de cocina con el paso del tiempo que le quedaba libre estudio corte y confeccion.
Luego decidio trabajar en su casa elavorando costuras para una empresa de telas y al mismo tiempo con las ganancias que le generaba decidio instalar una tortilleria y poco a poco decidio contruir un local en su casa y puso una abarroteria de productos comestibles,que lleba por nombre "BUENOS AIRES" y ese es su actual negocio con el que pudo construir su casa,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos comestibles.
texts.en:
Estefana is 56 years old, has 4 children, and two of them live with her at the moment. Mrs. Estefana was only 11 years old when she began working with her mother cleaning homes since they did not have much money. Since she was the eldest she also worked with her father at the counter of a clothing warehouse. She was then hired in a fabric warehouse and a helper in a kitchen. She used her free time to study dressmaking.
She then decided to work from home to make clothing for a fabric company. She used those profits to build a tortilla shop and little by little she built a grocery shop within her home called "BUENOS AIRES" which is the business that helped her build her home. She is requesting the loan to buy edible merchandise.

loans.use: buy edible merchandise.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is 39 years old. She lives in Dalarik Village with her two sons. Gayane's elder son, Davit is 21, and her younger son, Tigran is 19. Gayane works at the local village hall. Her two sons also work and support their mother. 

Ten years ago Gayane decided to start running a farm and have stable source of income for her children. Currently Gayane breeds cattle and plans to expand her farm by developing sheep breeding. Thus she has applied for this loan to purchase 10 mother sheep. This will allow Gayane to noticeably increase her income and create prosperous living conditions for her sons and their families in the future.

loans.use: to pay for 10 mother sheep.

loans.name: Nguon

texts.en:
Nguon is a 38-year-old farmer from a small village of Kompong Cham Province. She is married and lives in her own home with her husband and a lovely young child. She helps her husband, who is the income provider in the family, by devoting herself to her agricultural business. She grows rice and vegetables on her existing farmland, about 3 hectares. 

Nguon is requesting a loan to purchase a water pump to bring enough water to cover her crops because there isn’t enough rain for that. She now can keep the balance of water in her field to ensure a good production for her crops. She hopes she will be able to send her child to obtain a university degree.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump.

loans.name: Sajida Parveen's Group

texts.en:
Sajida parveen is a 48-years-old married woman and a mother of two children; both are sons. Her elder son financially supports the family by working in a factory earning a monthly wage while her youngest son is free and doesn’t do anything.
 
Sajida herself is a business woman and operates a clothing sales business. She sells clothes to her community clients and different cloth shops for profit. The variety of her clothes are much in demand by her customers. She keeps herself up-to-date about the latest trends in fashion which helps her in understanding her customer’s choices. 

She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her clothing sales business. With the loan, she will buy clothes of different varieties in larger quantities for selling. 

She is confident that the loan investment will give a boost to her business and increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 36 years old and divorced. She is blessed with one child, aged 14-years-old. She owns a cafeteria, a business she started five years ago, and earns a monthly income of KES 20,000. 

She is requesting a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase a bags of maize and beans, cooking fat and a sack of charcoal for the hotel business. 

The profit she earns from it will be ploughed back to her business and part of it repays her loan. Her hope is to become a successful business woman and open a bigger hotel. This is her first loan.

loans.use: to purchase a bags of maize and beans, cooking fat and a sack of charcoal for the hotel business.

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es: Yesenia, de 35 años es una mujer emprendedora. Vive en compañía de Rubén, su esposo desde hace 11 años, ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Paccha. Como presidenta de su asociación, siempre demuestra responsabilidad en todo lo que realiza. Su vida ha estado ligada a la agricultura y la ganadería que hoy es su fuente de ingresos, cuando formo una familia a la lado de su esposo decidieron intensificar esta actividad sembrando principalmente papa, olluco y habas, como también alfalfa para el ganado, que tiene, pues cuenta con 2 toros y un burro para carga. Cuando llega la temporada de la cosecha  puede ver los frutos del arduo trabajo cuando llega a vender sus alimentos, existen épocas donde los precios de sus productos están a un buen precio, sin embargo existen épocas en que no es muy favorable el precio del mercado. Sin embargo siempre sale adelante porque también se apoya  de la venta de animales que realiza. Pero no se desespera, ya que recibe el apoyo de su esposo, quien trabaja en una mina y recibe un sueldo fijo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “productores agrícolas” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP. Es una de las socias más antiguas de la asociación que integra, se siente muy orgullosa de permanecer durante este tiempo porque  tiene la satisfacción de crecer sostenidamente en su negocio por los prestamos que ha recibido. Yesenia de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes para esparcir entre sus sembríos de habas, además de útiles escolares para sus hijos.
texts.en: Yesenia, age 35, is an enterprising woman. She lives together with her husband Rubén; they have been married for 11 years. Together they have 3 children, whom they care for in their own house, located in the town of Paccha. As president of her communal bank, Yesenia always demonstrates responsibility in all that she does. Her life has been tied to farming and ranching, which today is her source of income. When she and her husband started a family, they decided to intensify this activity, mainly planting potatoes, olluco and beans, as well as alfalfa for their livestock, since they have 2 bulls and a burro to carry loads. When harvest time comes, she can see the fruits of her hard work when she goes to sell her crops. There are seasons when the prices of her products are at good levels; however, there are also times when the market prices is not very favorable. Nevertheless, she is making steady progress, because she also benefits from the animal sales she carries out. She does not despair, since she has the support of her husband, who works in a mine and receives a fixed salary. She belongs to the "productores agrícolas” ["agricultural producers"] communal bank, and this is the ninth loan with MFP. She is one of the most longstanding members in her communal bank, and she is very proud of remaining during this time since she has the satisfaction of sustained growth in her business thanks to the loans she has received. Upon receiving her support, Yesenia will invest the funds she is requesting in buying fertilizers to spread on her bean fields, as well as school supplies for her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers as well as school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Elva Mirian

texts.es: Elva de 42 años vive ( libertad ecuador ). Ella escogió este negocio que es la venta de ropa por motivo de necesidad económica. De esta manera ella a podido salir adelante con dus hijos trabaja todos los días sola. A futuro anhela reparar su casa y darle una buena educación a sus hijos. Con el préstamo comprara ( jeans blusas sabanas etc ).
texts.en: Elva is 42 years old. She lives in Libertad, Ecuador. She chose the business of selling clothing out of economic necessity. In this way, she has been able to help herself and her children get ahead. She works every day by herself. In the future, she wants to repair her house and give her children a good education. With the loan funds, she will buy jeans, blouses, sheets, etc.

loans.use: to buy shirts, jeans, sheets and other items to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Nadiah

texts.en:
Nadiah is a 53-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children. She sells blankets, and she works from her home. She is requesting a loan of 700 JD to purchase more blankets for resale.

Nadiah is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase blankets for business purposes

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz, aged 36 years, runs a sewing business. Her work is home-based. She receives orders from her community clients and relatives and earns a good income by finishing them on time. Her earning allows her to paying off the utilities. 
 
She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her brother who operates a business selling fruit. He has been doing this business for over eight years. He boasts a good clientele and makes good sales. He sells fruit by visiting different areas and streets with his four-wheeled cart. His honesty and fairness in dealing motivates his customers to approach him to buy their fruit.  

He will invest the loan in buying fresh seasonal fruit in larger quantity for resale. Shahnaz is hopeful that the loan investment will bring positive financial changes to his business and he will be able to serve many more customers as well.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruit for fruit-selling business

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 39 years old. She is married to Julius and together they have two children. She is a tailor and has been in the business for the past 10 years.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a staff member. This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the loan to purchase clothing material for use in her business.

She hopes to expand her tailoring shop and be an employer to many.

loans.use: to purchase clothing material for making dresses.

loans.name: Ketty Ines

texts.es: Ketty de 34 años vive ( libertad ecuador ). Ella comenzó con vender ropa en la universidad . al ver que le iba muy bien aumento su mercadería.  hasta ahora realiza la venta de ropa y de esa manera saca adelante a su familia. A futuro ella anhela patentar su negocio y tener su casa propia. Con el préstamo comprara ( blusas jeans ect ).
texts.en: Ketty is 34 years old. She lives in Libertad, Ecuador. She started selling clothing at the university. Upon seeing that it was going very well for her, she expanded her stock of merchandise. Now she has a business selling clothing, and in this way she is helping her family get ahead. In the future, she hopes to patent her business and have her own house. With the funds from the loan, she will buy blouses, jeans, etc.

loans.use: to buy jeans, blouses and sport clothing to sell.

loans.name: Merab

texts.en:
Merab is 53 years old. He lives in Adigeni District, in the southern part of the country. Merab is married and lives with his family: his wife – Mzia, his 27-year-old son, his daughter-in-law and his 3-month-old granddaughter. 

Merab’s son and daughter-in-law work as teachers in the village school. Merab works as a night-watchman in a local company. Along with his main job, Merab heads up the agricultural business of the family. He has a small dairy farm with two milk cows. Mzia produces cheese and sells it on the local open market. Along with the above-mentioned activities, the family owns a plot of land, where maize, haricot and potatoes are grown. Merab and Mzia sell harvested products to local greengrocery products retailers. The total average monthly income of the family is 900 Laris.

Merab requested credit for purchasing potatoes for sowing. This year he will purchase a better sort of potatoes and sow them. Merab and Mzia will work hard during the whole spring and get a better harvest in summer. It will be sold to local retailers again. The family will get more income and Merab and Mzia will use it for purchasing household goods, to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes for sowing

loans.name: Katya

texts.en:
Katya is 31 years old. She lives in Brnakot village with her family: her husband, her son and her mother-in-law. The main source of income for the family comes from agriculture: cattle breeding and land cultivating. Katya cultivates potatoes and beans and keeps livestock. With their hard work, the family has developed the farm and created favorable conditions for its stable growth. 

Katya needs some financial investments to start and complete land cultivation. With the help of the loan, she plans to purchase seeds and fuel. She will also renovate the combine harvester, which will allow her to cultivate the land more effectively. Katya also plans to purchase forage to feed the cattle. 

This loan will help Katya and her family to have a stable source of income during this year and live a prosperous life.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, forage, fuel and renovate the combine harvester

loans.name: Binali

texts.en:
Binali is 50 years old and married with six children.  Binali has been breeding cows for the last 15 years. After several attempts to find a job, he gave up and decided to start his own business. With the help of his wife, they purchased their first cattle.

Binali usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months and then resells them for a more profitable price in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 250 AZN and this business is the only source of financial income for his family. Beef is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like "pilau" and "dolma". Binali also keeps milk cows for personal use and for selling milk to neighbors.  

He wants to expand his business and improve the living conditions of his family. He applied for a 1500 AZN loan to purchase two cattle, one milk cow and fodder.

loans.use: to buy two cattle, one milk cow and fodder

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer lives in Yei. She sells food in a food stall and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has three children; two of them are in school. 

Jenifer heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 SDG in order to purchase cassava flour and maize. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase cassava flour and maize for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in Yei. She sells charcoal and has been in business for five years. She is 40 years old, married, and has six children; five of them are still in school. 

Mary heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Margarita Lourdes

texts.es: Margarita de 34   años vive ( libertad ecuador ). Ella escogió este negocio que es la venta de ropa por motivo de que su esposo la abandono . De esta manera ella saca adelante a sus hijos . aparte ella tiene un bazar y le va bien .trabaja todos los días sola. A futuro anhela reparar su casa y darle una buena educación a sus hijos. Con el préstamo comprara ( jeans blusas sabanas etc ).
texts.en: Margarita, 34, lives in Libertad, Ecuador. She chose this business, clothing sales, because her husband abandoned her and this was a way to support her children. In addition she has a variety store and it is doing well. She works alone every day. In the future she looks forward to repairing her house and giving her children a good education. She will use the loan to buy jeans, blouses, sheets, etc.

loans.use: to buy pots, shirts and other clothing.

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga, de 44 años es una mujer alegre. Tiene 3 hijos, pero solo vive con una de ellas: Lisbeth, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Paccha. Cultiva principalmente la papa, el maíz y también alfalfa para dar de alimentar a sus animales, tiene vacas, terneras y ovejas que con la ayuda de su hija llevan a pastear al campo cuando es escaso  la producción de alfalfa que generalmente en época de verano no se produce en cantidades suficientes y lo que llega a cosechar vende al mercado provincial de su localidad. También vende  de acuerdo a la ocasión sus animales como ovejas, vacas y toros; cuando se le presenta una oportunidad de venta, que por lo general acuden a su casa, considera que es bueno trabajar en estas dos actividades paralelas  para  mantener la estabilidad de los ingresos y crecer progresivamente. Pero como es muy trabajadora, también trabaja embolsando carne de pollo en una empresa, cuenta que lo hace de 2 a 3 veces a la semana, pues tiene que cuidar de sus animales  y producción. Ahora se ha trazado metas concretas para  seguir creciendo. Y está segura de lograrlo. Se entero de MFP,  por medio de una vecina de su comunidad que la invito a formar parte del grupo solidario que hoy integra por segunda vez, en todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser responsable en sus pagos y se ha ganado la confianza  de ser una persona con garantía para seguir accediendo a créditos que son su oportunidad de crecimiento.
Olga de recibir su apoyo,  invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de medicinas, para poder dosificarlos y calcificarlos, y si el dinero le alcanza podrá también comprar alfalfa, para sus animales.
texts.en:
Olga, age 44, is a cheerful woman. She has 3 children, but she lives with only one of them, Lisbeth, in her own house, located in the town of Paccha. She mainly grows potatoes, corn and also alfalfa to feed her animals. She has cows, calves and sheep, which with the help of her daughter she takes to graze in the countryside when her alfalfa production is low. This happens generally in the summer season, when it is not produced in sufficient quantities, and what she is able to harvest she sells at the provincial market in her town. She also sells her animals from time to time, such as sheep, cows and bulls, when an opportunity for a sale presents itself. Generally, the buyers come to her home. She thinks it is good to work in these two parallel activities to maintain stability in her income and gradually expand her business. However, since she is very hard-working, she also works packaging chicken meat in a company. She reports that she does this 2 or 3 times a week, since she has to take care of her animals and crops. Now she has set concrete goals to continue to expand her business, and she is sure that she will achieve them. She found out about MFP through a neighbor in her community who invited her to join the communal bank, where she is now a member for the second cycle. Throughout this time she has demonstrated responsibility with her payments, and she has won confidence for being a person who can be vouched for, so she can continue having access to loans, which are her opportunity for growth. 

Upon receiving her support, Olga will invest the funds she is requesting in buying medicines in bulk to prepare by type and dosage for her animals, and if she still has sufficient funds, she will also be able to buy alfalfa for them.

loans.use: to buy medicines for her animals and alfalfa.

loans.name: Peterson

texts.en:
Peterson is a forty-four-year-old  married  man with three children. He owns a shop and a cafeteria business in  Emali.  He has been in the business for twenty years now and gets a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings.


This will be his sixth loan with KADET LTD, and he plans to use the entire loan to purchase more goods  and pay for his license. With the profit that he will get, he wants to pay school fees and support his family. In future he wants to live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more goods  and pay for his license

loans.name: Selina

texts.en:
Selina lives in Yei. She sells food in a food stall and has been in business for three years. She is 28 years old, married, and has two children; both of them are in school. 

Selina heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 1000 SDG in order to purchase cassava flour and maize. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase cassava flour and maize for sale.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en:
Armine is a 32-year-old trader from Yerevan. She trades clothing from a rented booth in the city market. Armine started this business five years ago.

Armien lives with her father, a constructor; her mother, a housewife, and her brother, a businessman. 

Now she needs investments to add new inventory and offer a larger variety of clothing for her clients. This loan will help Armine to implement this goal by purchasing clothing to develop her business further.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 45 years old. She lives in Olkalou and is married. She has two children who are 28 and 26 years old.

Jane is a farmer and has been for the past nine years. She has applied for her second loan from KADET Ltd. to enable her to buy fertilizers, potato seedlings and pesticides and to pay for labor for her farm.

Jane wants to start zero grazing in the near future.

loans.use: To buy potato seeds and fertilizers and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Segerina

texts.en:
Segerina lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for three years. She is 39 years old and married. She has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Segerina heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for two years. She is 40 years old, married, and has three children; two of them are still in school. 

Esther heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Sarwar Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Sarwar bibi is 43 years old, a married woman and a mother of four children. They stay at home and none of them attends school. Her husband runs a small restaurant in the community market where he sells Punjabi food items like "Daal chawal" (made with lentils and served with rice and pickle) and "Sabzi roti" (made with vegetables and served with bread & salad). His food items are famous among local people. They come from different areas to taste his food. He can boast a good clientele and earns good income. 

Sarwar also supports his business by preparing food for his restaurant. Her husband feels delighted to see her support. Besides helping her husband, Sarwar always gives full attention to her household work and manages the responsibilities easily. 

She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will invest the loan in buying required raw materials like flour, rice, lentils, vegetables, cooking oil and spices in larger quantity so that he can make good quality food to serve to his customers. 

Sarwar is confident about the positive financial growth of her husband’s business after the loan investment.

loans.use: To buy food materials for restaurant business

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John repaid his previous loan well and in good time, and this will be his second loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase more piglets for rearing.


 
With the profit that he will get, he wants to stabilize the business. In future he wants to open another carpentry business.

loans.use: to purchase more piglets to raise

loans.name: Betty

texts.en: Betty lives in Yei. She sells from a food stall and has been in this business for five years. She is 32 years old, married, and has six children, all of whom are still in school. She heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 700 SDG in order to purchase beans and sugar. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sugar for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a sixty-year-old married man with seven children. He sells livestock in the Barazani market. He has been in the business for twelve years now and gets a monthly income of approximately fifteen thousand shillings. This will be his seventh loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase more goats and cows, and with the profit that he will get he wants to pay school fees for his children. In the future, he wants to live a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more goats and cows.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is 57 years of age. He is married and has two children who are in the high school and college levels of education. Reynaldo’s wife is engaged in a retailing business, selling a variety of grocery items like powdered juice, spices, biscuits, soft drinks and canned goods.

With his determination to give a better quality of life to his family, Reynaldo found a source of income that would help him to finance his family's needs. He is engaged in selling spare parts in the market. He has been in this business for 15 years.
 
Reynaldo wishes to extend the products he offers for his customers, but he doesn’t have enough capital to do it. Thus, Reynaldo is asking for a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy a pump belt, tires, sprockets and motorcycle chains. He hopes to maintain the business for a continued source of income.

loans.use: to buy a pump belt, tires, sprockets and motorcycle chains.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for three years. She is 25 years old and married. She has three children; two of them are in school. 

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 48 years old. She lives in Achanan village with her husband, two children and her sister-in-law. Marina works at the local school as a teacher, and her husband works at the battery farm in Kapan city. 

Besides the main work, the family is also involved in cattle breeding. The number of livestock in their farm is four. Marina sells the received milk in Kapan city.

Marina would like to increase the number of cattle, for which she has applied for this loan. She will also renovate the barn and create better conditions for the cattle.
 
This loan will help Marina to gather more income from milk sales, which is important for her to make savings for her children's education.

loans.use: to pay for barn renovation and cattle.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for five years. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children; three of them are still in school. 

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit is 47 years old. She lives in Geghanist village, in the west of the country, with her husband, a farmer, and her student son. Anahit and her husband has been running a greenhouse for 12 years. They grow tomatoes. 

Anahit has applied for this loan to purchase tomato seeds, so that she can harvest more tomatoes. This will allow Anahit to sell more tomatoes and get more income, which will help her to insure better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to pay for tomato seeds

loans.name: Ludovico

texts.en:
Farming is the main source of income for Ludovico. He plants and harvest rice in their village. With his desire to improve their living, Ludovico also engages in hog raising. He has been in this type of business for over 20 years. 

Ludovico is married and has three children. With the profits he earns from his hog raising business, Ludovico is able to provide his children's allowances for school. His business serves as his assistant in times of crisis in providing his children's needs for school.

Ludovico wants to continue operates the business while he can manage it. He needs additional working capital to maintain the business. Ludovico decided to borrow a loan of P40,000 to buy feed for his hogs. He hopes to continue operating the business and further support his children's needs in their schoolllife.

loans.use: to buy feed for his hogs.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a 26-year-old mother of three children. She is married to Mourice, who is a farmer and also produces additional income.

Jackline sells bricks and concrete, a business she has been doing for the past one year, and makes a monthly income of 6,000 Kenyan shilling (KES). She is taking her first loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to expand her concrete and bricks business. 

Her profits will be used to improve her family's living standards. Her dream is to grow her business through KADET loans.

loans.use: To expand her concrete and bricks business.

loans.name: Besta

texts.en:
