Besta lives in Yei. She sells from a food stall and has been in business for five years. She is 42 years old, married, and has six children, four of whom are still in school. 

Besta heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 2,000 SDG in order to purchase cassava flour and maize. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase cassava flour and maize for resale.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for five years. She is 35 years old, married, and has five children. Three of them are still in school. 

Eva heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her second loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 800 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase trousers and shirts for resale.

loans.name: Rima

texts.en:
Rima is 59 years old. She lives in a small village of South Georgia with her family, a 38-year-old son, a daughter-in-law and two grandchildren, 11 and 9 years old. The children go to the local school. Rima has health problems and she receives a relevant pension from the government. 

Her son leads the agricultural business of the family. They have a family-owned plot of the land where they grow potatoes. Rima’s son and her daughter-in-law work on the plot. They sell harvested potatoes to local grocery wholesalers. The total average monthly income of the family is 550 GEL, including Rima’s pension.

Rima requested a loan for purchasing potatoes for sowing. The family will cultivate land and sow potatoes. They will work hard on the plot during spring season and hope that weather conditions will be favorable as well. In summer the family will get the harvest and sell it through existing distribution channels. They will use the income during the next year for financing the family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes for sowing.

loans.name: Joice

texts.en:
Joice lives in Yei. She sells fish and has been in business for three years. She is 40 years old, married, and has five children. Two of them are still in school. 

Joice heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is a responsible mother of a young kid, residing in Kompong Cham province. During her lifetime, farming has been the main source of work, and therefore it is the main source of income for the family as well. For additional income, Chan plans to set up a pig raising business. She already built a piggery in her yard, where she can place around 3-4 pigs.

She is taking out this loan to purchase pigs for breeding purposes. She hopes to make a good income after 4-5 months of raising. With the increase in income, she wants to renovate her present house that is getting old.

loans.use: to purchase pigs for breeding purposes.

loans.name: Shamim Akhtar's Group

texts.en:
Shamim akhtar is a widow who lost her husband as a result of sudden death. Her husband’s death was a great loss in her life. She became totally shattered, but she recovered herself for her kids. She is a mother of two kids. Her elder son is involved in a computer repairing and computer parts sales business. He is very talented in his work. His efficient work in repairing and his good customer dealings earn him better profits which he uses to manage the financial needs of the family.
 
Shamim herself does decorative embroidery work. Her work is home based. She does work for her neighboring areas and earns money after completing the orders. She has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her son’s business. He will invest the loan in the buying of computer spare parts and repairing tools to provide better services to his customers and thus increasing his income. She is hopeful the loan investment will upgrade her son's business and improve his financial position.

loans.use: To buy computer spare parts and repairing tools.

loans.name: Nuvia Xiomara

texts.es:
Nuvia, de 35 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos de 12, 14, 16 y 18 años de edad, vive con su familia en una aldea del municipio Esparta Atlántida.
 Doña Nuvia, es una persona muy emprendedora, ella tiene dos negocios uno es la crianza y venta de cerdos y el otro es una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como ser granos básicos, refrescos, churros, productos de limpieza, medicamentos, etc. La pulpería la estableció hace 4 años  y la otra actividad de crianza de cerdos hace 3 años. Su gran motivación de obtener ingresos y esforzarse con los negocios ha sido el deseo de superación de sus hijos dándoles la oportunidad de estudio.
Esta solicitando 12,000.00 Lempiras con el cual comprara un cerdo  para  críanza y  concentrado para su alimentación. Con esta inversión ella espera crecer en  este negocio de venta de cerdos ya que es muy rentable y le permitirá incrementar sus  ingresos.
texts.en:
Nuvia, age 35, is married and has four children, ages 12, 14, 16, and 18.  She lives with her family in a village in the Esparta Atlántida municipality.

Nuvia is a very enterprising woman.  She has two businesses.  One is raising and selling pigs, and the other is a general store.  She sells basic needs products like basic grains, soft drinks, churros, cleaning products, and medicine, etc.  She established the general store four years ago.  She has been raising pigs for three years.

Her great motivation to get income and to work hard with the businesses has been the desire to improve for her children.  She wants to do this in order to give them the chance to go to school.

She is requesting a loan for 12,000 lempiras in order to buy a pig to raise and to buy concentrated feed for the pigs.  With this investment she hopes to grow in this business of selling pigs.  It is very profitable, and it will allow her to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a pig to raise and to buy concentrated feed for pigs.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 40 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: Deysi y Yareli a las que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Paccha. Su principal trabajo es el mantenimiento de sus animales a los que cría con mucha dedicación, posee varias cabezas de ganado ovino, los que mantiene en las estancias, ya que no tiene prohibido tenerlos en su casa, por el espacio que ocuparían. Por ello constantemente los visita, ya que son cuidados por pastores a los que paga mensualmente. Además de dedicarse a la agricultura, pero solo en temporadas de sembríos, por ejemplo tiene habas y papa, que muy pronto cosechará, está segura de obtener buenos ingresos pues sus sembríos, se encuentran saludables y creciendo sin dificultad. Asimismo por las noches se dedica a cuidar el pequeño hospital de su pueblo, donde le pagan un sueldo mensual, por su parte siempre se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, ya que por las tardes cocina en el comedor. De esa manera puede mantener a sus hijos y sacarlos adelante por ella misma. Se entero de MFP,  por medio de una vecina de su comunidad que la invito a formar parte del grupo solidario, es la primera vez y demostrará ser responsable en sus pagos y se ha ganado la confianza  de ser una persona con garantía para seguir accediendo a créditos que son su oportunidad de crecimiento. Nancy de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de medicinas para dosificar y mantener a sus animales con vitaminas y calcios para que crezcan sanos y saludables.
texts.en:
Nancy, 40, is a hardworking woman. She lives with her two children, Deysi and Yareli, whom she is raising in her own house, located in the town of Paccha. Her principal work is raising animals and she does so with great dedication. She owns various heads of sheep, which she keeps on a ranch since they are banned from her house because of the space they would occupy. Consequently she constantly visits them since they are cared for by shepherds whom she pays monthly.

As well she engages in farming, but only during the planting season. For example she has beans and potatoes that she will harvest shortly. She is certain she will earn a good income since her fields are healthy and growing without any difficulty.

In addition, at nights she takes care of the small hospital in her village, where they pay her a monthly salary. She has always been characterized as a very resourceful woman, since in the afternoons she also cooks in the cafeteria. In this way she is able to support her children and move them ahead on her own. 

Nancy learned about MFP from a neighbor in her community who invited her to be part of the communal bank. This will be her first loan and she will prove that she is responsible in making her payments and has earned confidence as a trustworthy person so that she can continue applying for loans, which are her opportunity for growth. Upon receiving your support Nancy will invest the money in the purchase of medicine to provide her animals the vitamins and minerals that insure healthy growth and development.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and calcium for her animals.

loans.name: Washinton Sigifredo

texts.es: Washinton  de 52 años vive ( duran ecuador ). El decidió entrar al oficio de ser taxista por la falta de trabajo. compro el auto y decidió ser taxista. El trabaja con mucho esfuerzo y ganas todos los días solo . a futuro el anhela tener una buena vivienda. Con el préstamo comprara ( asi comprar herramientas, llantas para el auto).
texts.en: Washinton, who is 52 years old, lives in Duran, Ecuador. He decided to become a taxi driver due to the lack of work. Washinton bought a car and became a taxi driver. He works by himself, with much effort and desire, every day. In the future, he hopes to have a good house. With this loan, he will buy tools and tires for his car.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts, tires and tools for his old taxi.

loans.name: Ân

texts.en:
Ân, age 44, is a rice farmer living in the Prey Chhor district of Kompong Cham.  She is married to Khorn, who is currently planting a variety of crops to earn a living, earning an income about USD2 each day. This couple has six kids, two of whom are married and the other four are single, living under their parents' support. One of them is employed as a domestic worker in the water factory, getting a formal salary every month. He always shares his low income with them in order to help with the family’s expenses.  

Ân will be using this loan to buy a few sacks of fertilizer for making her crops grow well. In the future, she hopes she can expand her crop-planting business, to build a bigger house and assist her children finish a high level of education.

loans.use: to buy a few sacks of fertilizer for making her crops grow well.

loans.name: Martha Mariana

texts.es: Martha de 40 años vive ( duran ecuador ) . ella decidió entrar a la venta de pollo para sustentar a su familia. Lo distribuye en su casa. Trabaja todos los días  junto con su esposo. A futuro anhela tener el negocio grande. Con el préstamo comprara ( pollos ).
texts.en: Martha, age 40, lives in Duran, Ecuador.  She decided to start selling chicken in order to support her family.  She sells from her home.  She works every day together with her husband.  In the future she wishes to have a big business.  She will use the loan to buy chickens.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Abadasiganakumurimo Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur Callixte est membre du groupe ABADASIGANAKUMURIMO. Il fait le transport des petits poissons. Il est mariée, âgé de 30 ans et a 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 12 ans et le moins âgé a 5 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l'école et n'a aucune autre personne en sa charge. Son niveau d'éducation est 6 ans de l'école primaire.
Il a adhéré à l'ACB en 2011 et c'est son premier cycle de crédit avec ce dernier. Le crédit lui donné est utilisé dans l'achat des équipements qu'il utilise au transport des petits poissons les amenant au bord du lac kivu vers le marché. Pour accroître son business, il va demander d'autres crédit en vue de devenir un grand transporteur des petits poissons et plus tard devenir un grand pecheur. Le profit de son commerce sera utilisé dans l'éducation des enfants.
texts.en:
Callixte is a member of the ABADASIGANAKUMURIMO group. He transports small fish. He is 30 years old, married, and has four children. His eldest child is 12 years old, and his youngest child is 5. Three of his children are in school, and he doesn't have anyone else living in his care. He has six years of primary school education.

He joined ACB in 2011, and this is his first loan cycle with them. The loan granted to him is used to buy equipment that he uses to transport small fish from Lake Kivu to the market. He is going to seek more loans in order to grow his business, become a great small fish carrier, and eventually become a great fisherman. The profit from his business will be put towards the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy equipment to facilitate the transportation of small fish

loans.name: Maria Mirtalina

texts.es:
Doña Mirtalina es una mujer soltera, cuenta con una edad de 51 años, ella reside en su propia casa junto a sus 2 hijos  ubicada  en el departamento de valle, honduras. El negocio de Doña Mirtalina es a la elaboración de tortillas y la venta de leña, el cual lo realiza en su propia casa es así que en el mismo lugar realiza sus ventas, la demanda del producto es mayor pero con  el capital que ella cuenta no es suficiente, Doña Mirtalina esta solicitando un crédito de 5,000.00 lempiras para  poder comprar maíz, leña, y cal, Doña Mirtalina  cree que así podrá mejorar la demanda en las ventas de su producto.
Doña Mirtalina sueña con poder mejorar su vivienda y que los ingresos económicos sean más productivos y con el apoyo de este crédito de PRISMA ella podrá superarse junto a sus hijos.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo 2012
texts.en:
Mirtalina is a 51 year old single mother of two who lives in her own home in the state of Valle, Honduras with her two children.  Mirtalina's business is making tortillas and selling firewood, which she carries out in her home.  Seeing as she works from home, the demand for her product is higher but she just doesn't have enough capital.  Mirtalina is requesting a loan of 5,000 lempiras to be able to purchase corn, firewood and whitewash in order to be able to improve the demand for her product and to increase sales.  Mirtalina dreams of being able to improve her home and hopes that her economic earnings will be more productive.  With the help of this PRISMA loan she will be able to achieve these things and more along with her children.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2012

loans.use: to purchase corn, firewood, and whitewash for her business.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
La joven Reina de 29 años de edad, es casada madre de una hija, ella vive en San Lorenzo Valle al sur de Honduras vive en casa de sus suegros.
Reina tiene un  negocio de venta de charamuscas y paletas en la casa donde vive ahí ella atiende a sus clientes que a diario le visitan para compra sus paletas y charamuscas ya que es una zona muy caliente.
Reina esta solicitando 5,000.00 lempiras para compra de leche, frutas, bolsa y vasos para elaborar sus productos, con el préstamo pretende mejorar sus condiciones de vida ya que tendrá mejorares utilidades y eso generara mas dinero.
Reina sueña con algún día tener su propia casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2012
texts.en:
Reina is a young woman of 29, is married with a daughter and lives in San Lorenza Valle in southern Honduras in the home of her in-laws'.  Reina has a business selling "charamuscas" (candy twists) and popsicles from her place of residence.  There she attends her customers daily who come by to buy popsicles and charamuscas since it is located in a particularly hot area.  Reina is requesting 5,000 lempiras to purchase milk, fruit, bags and cups so she can make her products.  With this loan she is hoping to improve her quality of life since she will have better supplies which will in turn generate more money.  Reina dreams of someday owning her own home.  

San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2012

loans.use: to purchase milk, fruit, bags and cups for her business.

loans.name: Etienne

texts.fr:
Monsieur Etienne, âgé de 47 ans, marié et ayant 4 enfants dont le plus âgé a 14 ans et le moins âgé a 5 ans est évangéliste. 3 de ses enfants vont à l'école et n'aucune autre personne en charge.
Il est devenu client d'ACB en 2012 et son premier cycle avec ACB. Comme stratégie, il prevoit bien maintenir sa maison. Son ambition est de devenir pasteur. Pour sa famille, il va éduquer et faire soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Etienne is 47 years old, married, and has four children. His eldest child is 14 years old, and his youngest child is 5. He is an evangelist. Three of his children are in school, and he doesn't have any other person living in his care.

He became a client of ACB in 2012, and this is his first loan cycle with ACB. He plans to keep his house well-maintained. His goal is to become a pastor. With respect to his family, he will take care of his children's educational and health needs.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to restore his house

loans.name: Soem

texts.en:
Soem, a 27-year-old married mother of two school-age children who completely depend on her income, lives in Kompong Cham province where she and her husband cultivate rice and bean crops on a few hectares of farmland. Soem acquired the knowledge of farming from her ancestors. who passed it down from generation to generation.

Soem is requesting a loan to purchase farming supplies such as seeds, mineral fertilizers and pesticides to keep her crops in good condition. Her business goal is to buy extra farmland to further increase her production annually.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies such as seeds, mineral fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Duo Luceros De La Mañana Group

texts.es: Duo Luceros de la Mañana, Doña Juana tiene 27 años de edad es casada y tiene 2 hijos es una persona que lucha dia a dia por sacar adelante a sus hijos,ella se dedica a la agricultura,como a la siembra de Rabano zanahoria, ella trabaja la tierra y siembra y ella mantiene su cultivos hasta la cosecha siempre lo ha hecho pero como no tiene mucho capital acude a solicitar este credito para la compra de abono semillas, pero la meta de ella es comprar mas terreno para poder sembrar un poco mas.espera que kiva le pueda ayudar para seguir con su cultivo.
texts.en: Juana, from Duo Luceros de la Mañana Group, is 27 years old. She is married, has two children and is someone who fights day after day to give a future to her children. Her activity is agriculture, she grows for instance radishes and carrots, tills her land, sows and takes care of her crops until harvest. She has always done so, but since she does not have much capital she asks for this loan to buy fertilizer and seeds. Ultimately her goal is to buy more land in order to be able to sow some more crops. She hopes Kiva can help her continue with her agriculture.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.es: Socorro, de 30 años es una mujer soltera. Vive junto a su mamá y su hija Luisita a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. Su principal ingreso económico se centra en la venta de ropa, tiene clientes fijos a los que visita constantemente, ellos le hacen pedidos a Socorro, quien compra las prendas para poder negociar, según comenta, hay fechas en las que ya le pagan por adelantado, pero otra sen las que tiene que dejar al contado. Ella entiende a todo ellos, pues su ventaje es ser carismática y muy solidaria. Paralelo a ese trabajo realiza la venta de productos de belleza por catálogos, vendiendo labiales, perfumes de reconocidas marcas. Además por las mañanas trabaja en una casa como empleada, realiza la comida y la limpieza, ahí obtiene un sueldo mensual con lo que puede cubrir los demás gastos familiares, pues cuida de su madre quien es anciana. Por ese lado, también recibe un sueldo de sus hermanos, quienes aportan para su madre. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Socorro de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de zapatos escolares y uniformes para abastecer el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Socorro, age 30, is a single woman.  She lives with her mother and her daughter, Luisita.  She takes care of them in her own house in El Tambo.

Her primary financial income centers around selling clothes.  She has fixed customers, whom she visits all of the time.  She says that her customers give their orders to Socorro, and she buys the garments in order to be able to fill their orders.  There are times when they pay her in advance, but other times she needs to deliver the clothes for cash.  She understands all of her customers as she has the advantage of being very charismatic and very supportive.

At the same time that she does this work she also sells beauty products by catalog.  She sells well-known brands of lipstick and perfume.  Also, in the mornings she is employed to work in a house.  She makes the food and does the cleaning.  That is where she gets a monthly salary, with which she is able to cover the rest of the family expenses.  She takes care of her elderly mother.  She gets payment from her siblings as they contribute for their mother.

This is her fourth loan with MFP.  She is happy that she has the money she needs to improve her business, which will improve her quality of life.  She likes belonging to her communal bank because the members are supportive and hard-working people.  Upon receiving your support Socorro will use the requested loan to buy school shoes and uniforms in order to stock up for her customers’ orders.

loans.use: to buy school shoes and uniforms.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina, de 45 años, es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Máximo de 25 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. Tiene 5 vacas, de las cuales hace queso con la leche que producen, el mismo queso que comercializa en la capital del país, donde también compra quesos a terceras personas, pues no se abastece del producto lácteo, para ello viaja constantemente. Además su esposo trabaja en la siembra de olluco, papa, cebada y yuyo (verdura que se come en la sierra del país), cuenta que, en sus tiempo libres cuando no hace negocio, viaja a la localidad de Pamuri, donde cuida junto a su esposo de sus sembríos. “Trabajamos en coordinación, pues cada uno tiene una actividad diferente, pero los dos nos dedicamos a la siembra”, afirma. Ya que, se desempeña como albañil, construyendo casas, en tiempos donde tiene muchos contratos, es Paulina, quien se encarga del mantenimiento de sus sembríos. Gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo conjunto; lograron adquirir una pequeña casa en la ciudad, su objetivo es terminar de acondicionarla para poder vivir. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. 
Paulina de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de ventanas y puertas para su casa, además de pintura y demás materiales para refaccionar su casa.
texts.en:
Paulina is a humble, 45-year-old woman who lives with Máximo, her companion of 25 years. They have 4 children who live with them in their house in Pampas. She has 5 cows which produce milk that she makes into cheese and sells in the capital. Since she also buys milk products which can not be stored from other people in the capital, she travels constantly. In addtion, her husband cultivates ulluco, potatoes, barley, and yuyo (herbs that are consumed in the mountainous areas of the country). 

She says that in her free time when she is not working, she travels to Pamuri, where she and her husband plant crops. “We work together, and though we do different activities, we both work in the fields," she states. Her husband also builds houses and when there are many construction contracts, it is Paulina who is responsible for the crops. Through their joint work and effort, they managed to buy a small house. Their goal is to finish air conditioning it so that they can live there. 

This is her 15th loan cycle with MFP. She is happy to have the necessary capital to increase her business and her quality of life. She also likes belonging to the association because the members are caring, hardworking people. On receiving the loan, Paulina will invest the money in windows, paint, and other materials to refurbish her house.

loans.use: to buy windows, doors, and paint for her house.

loans.name: Marta Julia

texts.es:
MARTA
La señorita Marta Julia se dedica a 3 diferentes negocios que son; a la crianza de animales ( cerdos  y gallinas) , elaboración de tejidos (güipiles, y fajas) y cultivo y venta de follaje  (hojas decorativas para arreglos florales). Desde hace 10 años, tiene 35 años de edad  es soltera, ella necesita otro crédito para la poder invertir  en los 3 negocios  ya que esta próximas las fechas de Semana Santa ella aprovecha las ventas de güipiles como también la venta de follaje  y algunas flores que vende para esa fecha el sueño que ella tiene a corto plazo ahora es poder comprar una bomba de agua para agilizar la riega en las plantas y también ayudar a sus padres económicamente.El sueño a largo plazo es poder tener su propio terreno para cultivar sus follajes y comprar otros cerdos  y gallinas para crianza.
texts.en:
MARTA
For the past 10 years, Marta Julia has engaged in 3 different businesses; raising livestock (pigs and chickens), weaving (blouses and skirts), and growing and selling greenery (decorative foliage for flower arrangements). She is 35 years old and single. She needs this loan to invest in these 3 businesses, as she wants to take advantage of the upcoming Easter week to sell blouses, greenery, and certain flowers sold for this holiday.

Her short-term dream is to be able to buy a water pump to facilitate watering her plants and also to help her parents financially. Her long-term dream is to have her own land where she can cultivate greenery and to buy more pigs and chicken to raise.

loans.use: to buy primary materials, livestock to raise, and plants to cultivate.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana de 44 años convive con Juan con quien tiene 3 hijos de 25, 23 y 20 años. Todos ellos viven juntos en una casa propia ubicada en el anexo de Yaroca, distrito de Palca – Tarma. Ana y su familia se dedican a la agricultura. Llevan más de 25 años en esta actividad obteniendo malas y buenas experiencias. Pero como ella es una mujer inteligente sabe negociar sus productos. “Siembro papas, flor de gladiolos, lechuga, arvejas, espinacas, y otros dependiendo de la temporada”, dice.
Sus hijos son su orgullo, ya que siempre están apoyándola. Cada uno tiene una actividad con la que aportan ingresos para el hogar. Uno de ellos es músico y viaja mucho, los otros 2 conducen los carros de Ana en las rutas de Tarma hacia Palca. Con este trabajo coordinado lograron obtener mejores condiciones de vida. Ana está contenta con sus logros, pero no es conformista, quiere seguir creciendo. Éste es sería su crédito número 9 con MFP, dice que pagará con puntualidad las cuotas mensuales como lo hizo anteriormente. Pertenece al banco comunal “Las Truchitas de Yaroca”, donde se siente cómoda y a gusto con un grupo responsable y solidario. Con el dinero que solicita, podrá hacer reparar sus carros, que ya llevan mucho tiempo si el mantenimiento correspondiente. Los repuestos o piezas tienen precios considerables.
texts.en:
Ana is 44 years old and lives in a civil union with Juan, with whom she has 3 children aged 25, 23 and 20. They all live together in the home they own in the village of Yaroca, in the Palca district of the Tarma region in Peru. Ana and her family live of agriculture, and have for 25 years, during which they had bad and good experiences alike. However, since she is an intelligent woman, she knows how to negotiate her products. "I plant potatoes, gladioli, lettuce, peas, spinach and others, depending on the season", she says.
Her sons are her pride, because they always lend a helping hand. Each of them has an activity with which they bring income to the home. One of them is a musician and travels a lot; the other two drive Ana's cars on the roads from Tarma to Palca. With all these efforts coordinated, they have managed to obtain better living conditions. Ana is happy with what she has achieved, but she will not rest: she wants to keep growing. This will be her ninth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She says she will pay back her monthly installments punctually, as has always been the case. She belongs to the village bank "Las Truchitas de Yaroca", where she feels comfortable and at ease with a responsible and supportive group. With the loan she is asking for, she will be able to pay for repairs on her cars, which have long gone without the necessary maintenance. The price of replacement car parts is very high.

loans.use: to afford maintenance for her vehicles and buy replacement parts.

loans.name: Hely

texts.es: Hely, de 24 años es una joven madre. Vive en compañía de su hija Kori, sus hermanos y padres, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Paccha. Desde su niñez  ha vivido aprendiendo todo lo referente a la agricultura  y heredo  algunas extensiones de terreno de sus padres que en la actualidad cultiva en ellos: papa, maíz, habas entre otros productos más, sus cosechas los vende al por mayor o también por parcela  para que otras personas extraigan el fruto, dependiendo de la situación, mientras espera su cosecha  trabaja como educadora de personas adultas enseñándoles a leer y escribir de donde también  tiene sus ingresos estables, además de poseer 6 ovejas pequeñas, las que lleva a comer en la estancia. Pero como es una mujer trabajadora, también se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogos, donde obtiene buenos ingresos, ya que es la única que tiene este negocio por la zona. Disfruta de cada trabajo que realiza porque le agrada y tiene conocimientos que le permiten desempeñarse de manera óptima, ve el futuro con gran entusiasmo y desea tener mayores ingresos para el futuro de su hija, a la que quiere brindarle lo mejor.  Ella pertenece al banco comunal “productores agrícolas” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP. Fue invitada por un familiar a ser parte de su asociación, de la que es una socia activa y comprometida en el cumplimiento de sus pagos por lo que  en la actualidad está muy contenta de trabajar para consolidar su capital de trabajo. Hely, de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de belleza para su negocio, asimismo en la compra de 6 ovejas nuevas para aumentar su ganado.
texts.en: Hely, 24 years old, is a young mother. She lives with her daughter Kori, her brothers and her parents in the house she owns in the village of Paccha. Since she was a child, she has been learning everything related to agriculture; she inherited a few plots of land from her parents, in which she now grows potatoes, corn, broad beans and others. She sells her harvest wholesale and also, depending on the situation, sells the use of a plot so that the harvest is done by others. While waiting for the harvest she works as an educator for adults whom she teaches to read and write, an activity from which she derives a stable income. She also owns 6 small sheep that graze on the family farm. Since she is a hardworking woman, she also sells beauty products from catalogues, an activity which generates a nice income because she is the only one in this type of business in the area. She enjoys every single one of her activities because she likes them and her knowledge helps her carry them out in the best way. She sees the future with great enthusiasm and wishes to increase her income in order to prepare her daughter's future, because she wants to give her the best. She belongs to the communal bank "productores agrícolas" (agriculture producers) and this is her third loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She was invited by a member of her family to become part of the communal bank, of which she is an active member; she is always punctual with her payments and is thus very happy now to work in order to consolidate her working capital. Hely, if she receives this loan, will invert the funds towards buying beauty products for her business as well as 6 new sheep to increase the size of her flock.

loans.use: to buy beauty products as well as six sheep.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es: Susan, de 21 años; es una joven luchadora. Vive en compañía de su mamá Yolanda, su papá Walter y su hermano José, en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Chilca. Estudia ingeniería civil en una universidad reconocida, donde paga una mensualidad. Por esa razón incursionó en el negocio de venta de productos para el hogar. Con el tiempo juntó lo necesario para abrir una ferretería simple, aún le falta mucho, pero espera que con su esfuerzo de resultados y pueda hacer que su negocio sea reconocido y sobre todo rentable. Sus principales ventas constan de cemento, fierros, clavos de todo tamaño y agregados. Cuenta que los fines de semana es donde ella tiene mayores ingresos, además cuenta que abrió un restaurante en sociedad con su mamá. Ahora desea mejorar las ganancias que percibe pues desea culminar sus estudios y comenzar nuevos proyecto, sabe que para lograrlo necesita un buen capital de dinero, que está segura de ahorra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “IDME” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Susan de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un estante donde colocará gaseosas y demás bebidas para su restaurante, además de platos y cubiertos para servir a los comensales.
texts.en: Susan, 21 years old, is a fighter. She lives with her mother, Yolanda, her father, Walter, and her brother, José, in their own house, which is in the Chilca district. She is studying civil engineering at a renowned university, where she pays monthly tuition. This is why she started a business selling household products. In time she put together the necessary items to open a simple hardware store, although she is missing a lot. She hopes that her effort will yield results and that she can make her business known and above all profitable. Her main sales are of cement, iron, nails of all sizes, and gravel. She says that the weekends are when she makes the most income, and she also says that she opened a restaurant with her mother. Now she wants to improve the income she earns, since she wants to finish her studies and start new projects. She knows that in order to achieve this she needs a good amount of money saved. She belongs to the "IDME" communal bank, and this is her eighth loan with MFP. She hopes for your cooperation in order to continue with her goals. On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments on time. She is also happy to be part of her communal bank because all of its members are responsible and supportive. Susan will use the loan to purchase a shelf where she can put soft drinks and other drinks for her restaurant as well as plates and cutlery to serve the guests.

loans.use: to purchase a shelf, plates, and cutlery

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz, de 37 años, es una luchadora madre soltera. Que cuida sola a sus 2 hijos, en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Tambo. Desde que se quedó sola al cuidado de sus hijos. Ella busco la forma de ganarse el dinero para sobrevivir. Es por ello que incursionó en lo que más sabe, “la costura”. Confecciona faldas típicas de toda variedad, fustanes, mantas y demás accesorios que utiliza las personas del campo todos los días y en festividades. Le va muy bien pues su taller se encuentra en una zona céntrica al lado del mercado de la ciudad de Huancayo. Ya tiene 4 años de experiencia y en todo este tiempo, aprendió muchas cosas. Como vender ropa diversa en festividades del país, ahí obtiene un dinero extra, con lo que puede solventar los gastos del hogar. Ahora quiere mejorar su negocio y convertirla en un taller reconocido. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “IDME” y este es crédito número trece con MFP,  donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Liz de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra se hilos, telas, cierres y demás accesorios que necesita para confeccionar las prendas.
texts.en:
Liz is a 37-year-old, dedicated, single mother. Since she became single, she has cared for her 2 children by herself in her home in Tambo district. She sought a way to earn money to survive and started what is referred to as a dressmaking business. She makes a variety of traditional skirts, petticoats, ponchos, and other accessories worn by people in the countryside. She is doing well because her workshop is located in a center alongside Huancayo's city market. She now has 4 years of experience and has leaned a lot, such as how to sell a variety of clothing during national festivals where she makes extra money with which she can pay her household expenses. 

She belongs to the communal bank “IDME.” This is her 13th loan cycle with MFP, with whom she hopes to continue working so that she can meet her goals and to whom she once again promises to make her payments. She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank because all its members are caring and responsible people. Liz will use the money she is requesting to purchase thread, cloth, zippers, and other accessories needed to make her garments.

loans.use: to buy thread, cloth, and zippers.

loans.name: Duo Azucenas De Magdalenas Group

texts.es: Duo Azucenas de magdalenas Maria antonia tiene 35 años de edad y tiene a su cargo 2 hijas que estudian en el intituto de la localidad de donde ella vive,ella se a dedicado al cultivo y venta de flores desde hace varios años ella misma las siembra y cultiva nos cuenta que anterior mente se dedicaba mayor mente el cultivo de ejotes y arbeja china pero con el transcurso del tiempo se dedico a sembrar flores,y se dio cuenta que la siembra de flores lleba un trabajo menos pesado y que sobre todo es bastante relajante al regarlas tiene al rededor de 400 a 500 plantas de distintas clases, es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de abono y veneno para las plagas, y asi darle mantenimiento,espera que fape le pueda dar ese apoyo que ella nececita.
texts.en:
Maria Antonia, a member of the Duo Azucenas de Magdalenas Group, is 35 years old, and cares for two daughters who are studying in the neighborhood school where she lives. 

She has been cultivating and selling flowers for some years and she tells us that before she thought of growing beans and Chinese peas but with the passing of time, having worked growing flowers, she realized that growing flowers is lighter work and above all is relaxing enough. 

She sows around 400 to 500 plants of various kinds, and this is why is is asking for a loan, in order to buy fertilizer and pesticide, so she can provide maintenance. She hopes that FAPE can give her the help that she needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide for the cultivation of flowers

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter, de 30 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de su mamá Martha y sus 2 hermanos, a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Lorenzo. Desde que su padre falleció, hace 22 años, sabía que su vida se centraría en el cuidado de su familia, mamá y hermanos. Por ello se mantiene soltero todavía, pues siempre fue un hombre responsable con las necesidades que tenían. Su principal ingreso económico se centra en el trasporte público con el motocarro que posee, ello le ayuda a obtener un ingreso diario, su ruta se centra en la entrada a su anexo y la ciudad, pero como él dice; también se dirige a diversos anexos, si le solicitan. “Todo es válido para poder obtener runa mejor ganancias al terminar el día”, comenta. Es así que se dedica, también al cuidado de sus animales entre cerdos, ovejas y cuyes. Ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a esto, su secreto se centra en la alimentación, ya que Portu propia cuenta siembra pasto para dar de comer a sus animales. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “fuerza san lorenzo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Walter de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más cuyes y alfalfa para su alimentación.
texts.en:
Walter is a 30 year old hard-working man. He lives with his mother Martha and his two brothers, who he takes care of in his own house located in the town of San Lorenzo. Ever since his father passed away 22 years ago, Walter knew that his life would center on the care of his family, mother, and brothers. Because of this he remains single, and he has always been responsible for their needs.

Walter's primary means of income comes from the public transportation he provides with his motorcar. This helps him to have a daily income. His route centers on the entrance of his annex and the city, but as he says, he also goes to various annexes if requested. "Anything goes to be able to have better earnings at the end of the day," he comments. 

It is with this mindset that Walter also cares for his animals, including pigs, sheep, and guinea pigs. He has already been doing this for 4 years and his secret focuses on the feeding, since he himself plants the grass to feed his animals.  

Walter belongs to the group "Fuerza San Lorenzo" and this is his first loan. He is happy because he has the capital necessary to improve his business and thus his quality of life. In addition, he likes to belong to the association because its members are caring and hard-working. Upon receiving the support, Walter will invest the requested money in the purchase of more guinea pigs and alfalfa for their feeding.

loans.use: to purchase more guinea pigs and alfalfa.

loans.name: Duo Azucenas De Maria Group

texts.es:
DUO AZUCENAS DE MARIA.
El  grupo está conformado por dos hermanas quienes son:  María ella se dé dedica a la elaboración de tejidos de güipiles  desde hace  30 años  ella tiene 40 años de edad,  inicio con la ayuda de su mama quien le enseño a tejer  desde  los 10 años de edad  desde entonces ella ha realizado diferentes labores de güipiles,  se independizo   con algunos ahorros que tenia compro  sus hilos que necesita  y su equipo de trabajo, tiene 8 hijos cuatro de ellos mayores de edad y los otro cuatro menores de edad quienes estudian en la escuela primaria de La Aldea donde ella vive, ella cuenta  con la ayuda de sus hijos mayores ya que el esposo es enfermo alcohólico  desde hace 1 año, también  sus papas la siguen apoyando para salir adelante con su negocio.  El deseo que ella tiene es que sus  hijos logren salir adelante con un sus estudios  y poder ser profesionales para que ellos sobresalgan en su vida y el deseo que tiene  para su negocio es poder contar con otras señoras que le ayuden a tejer güipiles para  poder vender en otros lados sus güipiles  y así mismo las ganancias que tenga poder invertir en la construcción de su casa.esta solicitando este creito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos. María Luisa  se dedica a la elaboración de güipiles    que inicio desde  hace 5 años
texts.en:
Dúo Azucenas de María is made up of two sisters.

María has worked weaving "güipiles" [also "huipiles," traditional blouses or tunics] for 30 years.  She is 40 years old.  She began with the help of her mother, who taught her to weave at the age of 10.  Since then she has done various types of güipiles.  She became independent with some savings that she had.  She bought the thread she needed and her work equipment.

She has eight children, four of them of age and the other four minors who study in the primary school in the town where she lives.  She has the help of her older children because her husband has been sick for a year, an alcoholic.  Her parents also continue to help her get ahead with her business.

Her desire is for her children to manage to get ahead with their studies and be able to be professionals to excel in their lives.  Her desire for her business is to be able to count on other women to help her weave güipiles to be able to sell them in other place.  In addition, she wants to be able to invest the profits she has in building her house.

She is requesting this loan to buy the basic necessities to make textiles.

María Luisa works making güipiles.  She began five years ago.

loans.use: to buy the basic necessities to make traditional textiles.

loans.name: Emerita

texts.es:
Emerita, de 46 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Raúl su esposo desde hace 26 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, de los cuales solo 2 viven con ellos: Anderson y Jefferson a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Paccha. Toda su vida ha estado ligada a la agricultura y la ganadería que hoy es su fuente de ingresos, cuando formo una familia a la lado de su esposo, decidieron intensificar esta actividad sembrando principalmente  papa y habas en gran cantidad. Además de pastizales para su ganado en diferentes terrenos de cultivo de los que han heredado ella y su esposo. La agricultura  es una actividad que le gusta mucho y disfruta de realizarla porque siempre está en contacto con el campo y la naturaleza y le trae mucha tranquilidad. Pero como ella es una mujer trabajadora, todas las mañanas saca a sus animales entre toros, vacas y ovejas para que puedan alimentarse, cuenta que desea realizar queso, pero todavía no cuenta con muchas vacas lecheras, pero lo que si realiza es el arado de la tierra con los toros que posee, “de esa manera ahorro la preparación de terreno por otras personas”, comenta. Muy pronto comprará más ovejas, con la ayuda de su esposo quien trabaja en una mina. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “productores agrícolas” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP. Es una de las socias mas antiguas de su asociación, se siente muy orgullosa de permanecer durante este tiempo porque  tiene la satisfacción de crecer sostenidamente en su negocio por los prestamos que ha recibido
Emerita de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 toros de raza para aumentar su ganado.
texts.en: Emerita is 46 years old and a hardworking woman. She has lived with her husband Raúl for 26 years. They have 4 children, only 2 of whom live with them: Anderson and Jefferson, whom they raise in the home they own in the village of Paccha. Emerita's whole life is tied to agriculture and animal husbandry, her sources of income. When she founded a family with her husband, they decided to intensify their activity by planting mainly potatoes and broad beans in large quantities. They also have grazing grounds for their cattle in various plots of arable land that Emerita and her husband inherited. Agriculture is an activity she very much enjoys and likes doing because she is always in contact with earth and nature, which she finds very calming. But since she is a hardworking woman, every morning she takes her bulls, cows and sheep out to graze. She tells us that she wants to churn cheese but does not yet own enough dairy cows. What she does use her bulls for is to till her own land: as she says, "this way I do not have to pay someone to prepare the soil". Very soon, she will buy more sheep, with the help of her husband who works in a mine. She belongs to the communal bank "productores agrícolas" (agriculture producers) and this is her seventh loan with Microfinanzas Prisma. She is one of the oldest members of her bank, and feels very proud of the fact, because she has had the chance to make her business grow consistently thanks to the loans she received. Emerita, if she obtains your support, will invert the funds towards buying two pedigree bulls to increase her herd.

loans.use: to buy two bulls.

loans.name: Solidario Clarisa Group

texts.es: Solidario Clarisa.doña Sarai tiene 54 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 3 hijos,tiene cuatro años de dedicarse a la venta de productos de consumo Diario nos cuenta que Nececita este credito para la compra de productos comestibles ya que nececita mas capital para surtir su tienda nos cuenta que esta muy contenta porque espera que kiva le pueda dar esa ayuda que ella nececita,tanto como las otras socias.
texts.en:
Solidario Clarisa
Sarai, 54, is a single mother with three children.  She has worked selling basic food products for four years.  She tells us that she needs this loan to buy food products because she needs more capital to stock her store.  She tells us she is very happy because she hopes Kiva can give her this help she needs, as do the other members.

loans.use: to buy food products to sell.

loans.name: Mov

texts.en:
Mrs. Mov, age 35, is a farmer. She grows crops on her farmland to make income to support her family. She and her husband have three children and live in the Prey Chhor district of Kompong Cham province. Her husband helps to support the family in the same business. Together, they are able to earn approximately $3.50 each day to cover their financial expenses. 

Mrs. Mov would like to ask for a loan from HKL in order to purchase a plot of additional farmland from her neighbor so that she can enlarge her farming business. 

With the increase in income, Mrs. Mov will use the profits to support her children's education and to make essential repairs to the old house in which the family lives.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of farmland for enlarging her farming business

loans.name: So

texts.en:
So, age 32, is a rice farmer. From this business, she can earn a suitable income to support her family. She and her husband have two children, both of whom attend the local school in the Baray district of Kompong Tom province. So's husband and children all assist with the farming work.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase cows to help with the farming work. This loan will enable her to maintain her expenses on plowing fees. 

She hopes to continually improve her business with the given funds.

loans.use: to purchase cows to help in her farming business

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 31 years old and is married with two children. He has a taxi (car) transport business to earn a living. Paul has been in this business for 10 years and has employed one person. He also farms to earn extra income. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Paul has been able to provide for his family and hopes to buy another car in the future. He has applied for a loan of 100,000 KES to buy new tires for his car.

loans.use: to buy new tires for his car.

loans.name: Charity

texts.en:
Charity, age 30, is a fish vendor in Yei. She has been engaged in this business for four years. She and her husband have three children, all of whom are enrolled in school. 

Charity heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 800 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty, age 30, sells fish to earn a living. She has been engaged in this business for four years. She and her husband have three children. The family lives in Yei. All three children are enrolled in school. 

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 500 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Raida

texts.en:
Raida, age 25, lives in Yei with her husband and their two children. She sells fish to earn an income, and has been in this business for two years. Both of her children are enrolled in school. 

Raida heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty lives, age 30, runs a food stall business to earn a living. She and her husband have four children. The family lives in Yei. She has been in her business for three years. Three of her children are enrolled in school. 

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale. 

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale

loans.name: Melva

texts.es: Melva, de 37 años, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 18 años junto a Olmes, su esposo. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Lorenzo. Todas las mañanas se dedica al cuidado de sus vacas, pues desde muy temprano las saca a los campos naturales para que se alimenten de pastos sanos y nutritivos. Gracias a sus cuidados, vende la leche que produce sus vacas a los comerciantes, para que realicen productos lácteos. Cuenta que al día vende de 22 a 25 litros de leche fresca. Pero como gusta de cuidar animales, además de brindarle buenos ingresos, también tiene ovejas, cerdos, cuyes y conejos, los cuales comercializa en carne a la feria que se desarrolla en Jauja, pero si tiene suerte los mismos compradores visitan su casa. Pues ella es muy conocida, ya que siembra productos agrícolas como papa, alverja y maíz, los cuales vende en su misma chacra y en épocas de cosecha, ya que es una mujer muy trabajadora. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Fuerza san lorenzo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Melva de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 parcelas de alfalfa para el alimento de sus animales.
texts.en:
Melva, 37 years old, is a working woman. She has been living with her husband, Olmes, for 18 years. They have 3 children who they care for in their own home, located in San Lorenzo. 

Every morning she cares for her cows; very early she takes them to pasture to feed them naturally and nutritiously. Thanks to her care, she sells the milk the cows produce to merchants, in order sell dairy products. She sells about 22 to 25 liters of fresh milk daily. 

But she likes caring for animals, and it brings in good income. She also has sheep, pigs, guinea pigs and rabbits, which she sells as meat at the Jauja market, but when she is lucky her buyers come to her house to buy the meat. 

She is very well known, growing agricultural crops such as potatoes, peas and corn, which she sells at the same farm during harvest times, as she is a very hard working woman. 

She belongs to the solidarity group “Fuerza San Lorenzo” and this is her first loan with MFP. She feels happy, obtaining the necessary capital to improve her business and therefore her quality of life. She also likes belonging to her association, because the members are united working women. 

Melva, upon receiving your help, will invest the requested money from the loan in the purchase of two parcels of alfalfa to feed to her animals.

loans.use: to buy two parcels of alfalfa

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teófila, de 33 años, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Antonio, su esposo desde hace 9 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Edwin, John y Eddy, juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Chacchacancha. Cada cosecha tiene que fertilizar sus cultivos por lo menos 4 veces, por eso siempre está atento a las fechas. Gusta mucho de la agricultura, su principal actividad económica. Todas las mañanas desde muy temprano junto a su esposo cuidan de sus cultivos entre: papa, olluco y maíz, los que en cada cosecha comercializan a la ciudad de Huancayo, o en sus mismos terrenos agrícolas, cuenta que su esposo en temporadas de demanda de alimentos, viaja él mismo para comercializar las cosechas integras. Al mismo tiempo, Teofila cuida de sus 8 cerdos, los cuales vende ensebándolos a la feria que se realiza en su localidad, además su esposo trabaja como cargador de costales de alimentos hacia los camiones, donde recibe un ingreso adicional. Ahora se encuentran viviendo en la ciudad, en una casa alquilada, pues sus hijos estudian en la ciudad, pero confiesan que siempre viajan a su pueblo, donde realizan sus actividades. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Teófila de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas, para limpiar sus sembríos, levantar los surcos, alinear los sembríos y quitar la maleza.
texts.en:
Teófila is a 33 year old hard-working woman. She lives with Antonio, her husband of 9 years. They have 3 children: Edwin, John, and Eddy, and together they live in their own house located in the town of Chacchacancha. 

For each harvest Teófila has to fertilize her crops at least 4 times, and because of this she is always aware of the dates. She enjoys agriculture very much and it is her primary means of income. Every morning beginning very early she and her husband take care of their crops, including potatoes, ulluco root, and corn. During every harvest they sell these crops in the city of Huancayo or in their own agricultural land. Teófila explains that during the high demand season for food, her husband himself travels to sell the integral crops. 

At the same time, Teófila takes care of her 8 pigs, which she fattens and sells in her local town's market. In addition, her husband works transporting bags of food to the trucks, from which he receives additional income. Currently Teófila and her husband are living in a rented house in the city since their children study in the city, but they confess that they always travel to their town where they do their activities. 

This is her third loan with MFP and Teófila is happy because she has the capital necessary to improve her business and thus her quality of life. Additionally, she likes belonging to the association because its members are caring and hard-working. Upon receiving this support, Teófila will invest the requested money in the purchase of tools to clear her fields, raise the rows, align the crops, and remove weeds.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural tools.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Angélica, de  46 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Ramulfo, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer independiente, estudió educación primaria y se desempeña como docente en una escuela de la ciudad. Es muy conocida y querida entre sus colegas y los alumnos. Este desarrollo lo obtuvo gracias a su esposo, quien también es docente y le inculcó el progreso y desarrollo. Por ello como buena madre de familia, espera que sus hijos sigan sus pasos y se convierten en profesionales. Hace algún tiempo sufrió un pequeño problema, cuenta que casi pierde su casa, por lo que ahora aprendió que tiene que registrar en el estado con los papeles que legalmente le amparan como propietaria, por ello ya comenzó a registrarse y muy pronto será dueña de la misma legalmente. Ella pertenece a un grupo solidario y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Angélica de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de los papeles para registrar su casa, como propia.
texts.en:
Angélica, 46, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her husband Ramulfo.  They have two children for whom they care in their own house.  She is an independent woman.  She studied elementary education and works as a teacher in a school in the city.  She is very well known and loved among her colleagues and the students.  She received this growth thanks to her husband, who also is a teacher and instilled in her progress and development.  As a good mother, she hopes that her children follow in her footsteps and become professionals.

Some time ago she had a small problem.  She says she lost her house.  She learned now that she has to register it with the state with the papers that legally protect her as the owner.  For this reason she already began to register herself, and very soon she will be the legal owner of the house.

She belongs to a solidarity group and this is her fourth loan with MFP, where she feels very satisfied for being able to carry out her activities without incident because she has the help of all of you.  In addition, she promises to make her payments punctually because she always was a hardworking and honorable person.

When she receives her support, Angélica will invest the requested money in paying for the paperwork to register her house as her own.

loans.use: to do the formalities to buy her house.

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en:
Gevorg is a 29-year-old entrepreneur from Yerevan. He lives with his wife, a nurse, pensioner parents, and student sister.

Gevorg trades with equipment for cars. He started this business in 2006 and has successfully run it and expanded the inventory variety. To meet his clients demands, Gevorg needs to add new types of equipment. Thus, Gevorg has applied for this loan to purchase the necessary equipment. This will help Gevorg to increase sales and get additional income, which is vital for Gevorg and his family to make ends meet.

loans.use: to pay for equipment for cars.

loans.name: Cicilia

texts.en:
Cicilia, age 30, is a fish vendor. She has been engaged in this work for four years. She lives with her husband and three children in Yei. All three children are enrolled in school. 

Cicilia heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Nina

texts.en:
Nina, age 60, is a farmer living in Dashtadem village. She lives with with 63-year-old husband, her 31-year-old daughter, her 31-year-old daughter-in-law, and her small grandchildren. 

Nina's husband and son are both employed in construction as well as helping to run the family farm, where they cultivate land and breed pigs. Nina has applied for this loan to start land cultivation. In particular, she plans to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer. 

Nina hopes to gather a rich harvest this year, which will allow her not only to support her family, but also to sell more, thus attaining additional income to further develop her farm.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 44-year-old livestock keeper in Mariakani. She is married. Lucy has been selling livestock and livestock products for the last 17 years and she is doing great.

This is Lucy’s third loan from KADET LTD. She plans to purchase more goats, cows, and poultry. She will use the anticipated profits to start a water selling business and repay her loan. She hopes to excel in the business.

loans.use: to purchase more goats, cows, and poultry.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther, age 42, operates a general merchandise business in Kimana. She has been in this business for 12 years now and earns a monthly income of 17,000 shillings. She and her husband have three children.

This will be Esther’s first loan with KADET Ltd. She plans use the entire loan to purchase a stock of jugs, thermoses, and basins to offer for sale. 

With the profit generated from this loan, she intends to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of jugs, thermoses, and basins to offer for sale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose, age 30, runs a food stall business. She has been engaged in this business for four years. She lives in Yei with her husband and four children. All the children are enrolled in school.

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 500 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale. 

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
Betty, de 23 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 2 años con José, su esposo. Ambos tienen un hijo: Jean Franco, al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Hualahoyo. Cada 15 días su esposo, regresa a casa. Ella se siente muy feliz, pues sabe que le ayudará en el negocio de ladrillos, sobre todo porque tiene mucho conocimiento de las nuevas tendencias en la fabricación, ya que trabaja en una reconocida fábrica a nivel nacional, de ladrillos. Al día realiza 500 ladrillos con la ayuda de un personal, al mes un promedio de 4 millares, los que vende a los proveedores que llegan a su misma fábrica. Todavía no tiene un negocio grande, “cuando mi esposo adquiera los conocimientos necesario, podré emprender una fábrica reconocida”, afirma con mucho optimismo. Paralelo a este trabajo, Betty, tiene una tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, posee todo lo necesario para poder atender a sus clientes y saciar todas sus necesidades. Por ahora ella, se centra en el desarrollo de este negocio sin descuidar lo que ya posee. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Betty de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mercadería y productos de primera necesidad para su tienda.
texts.en:
Betty is a hardworking, 23-year-old woman. For 2 years, she has lived with her husband José. They have a son Jean Franco, whom they care for in their home in Hualahoyo. Her husband returns home every two weeks. She is happy with this because she knows it will help his brick-making business. He is learning much about new manufacturing techniques because he works in a national brick manufacturing plant. He makes 500 bricks a day with the help of another worker and an average of 4000 bricks a month, which he sells to suppliers who come to his own small factory. 'When my husband acquires the necessary skills, he will be able to establish a reputable plant,” she declares optimistically. 

Along with this business, Betty has a grocery story where she sells consumer staples. She stocks all that is required to service her customers and satisfy their needs. For now she is concentrating on developing this business, without neglecting what she already has. This is her 6th loan cycle with MFP. She is happy to have the capital necessary to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She also enjoys belonging to her association because the members are caring and hardworking people. Betty will use the loan she is requesting to buy merchandise and consumer staples for her store.

loans.use: to buy consumer staples for her store.

loans.name: Rufo

texts.es:
Rufo, de 40 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 18 años en compañía de Yessi, su esposa. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Juan y Renzo a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca.
Junto a su esposa desde hace 4 años atrás, comenzó en el negocio de trasporte público, posee 4 autos, los cuales alquila a chóferes, por una suma considerable de dinero al día. Esto le permite, adquirir un ingreso estable, pero le preocupa el cuidado de sus vehículos, pues afirma que muchas veces los conductores irresponsables chocan sus autos y no responden por ello, “Es esa situación tengo que asumir los gastos, yo mismo”, comenta. La ruta en la que trabaja en céntrica de la plaza central a los registros públicos, su esposa controla la llegada de los autos que tiene la línea, de esa manera hace un buen equipo para su negocio. Pero como posee un licencia de conducir camiones, trabaja como chofer para trasportar carga pesada por todo el país, cuenta que dentro de poco viajará a Moya, para trasladar trigo, ahí le pagan muy bien pues el traslado de alimentos exige de mucha responsabilidad. Este es crédito número diecinueve con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Rufo de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de refacción de su vehículo que fue chocado.
texts.en:
Rufo, 40, is a hardworking man.  He has lived with his wife Yessi for 18 years.  Together they have two children: Juan and Renzo, whom they care for in their own home, located in the town of Chilca. 

Four years ago, along with his wife, Rufo started a public transportation business.  He has 4 automobiles that he rents to drivers for a considerable sum of money per day.  This has allowed him to have a stable income.  However, he is concerned about the care of his vehicles, because he says that many times the irresponsible drivers crash the cars and are not liable for it. "In this type of situation, it is I who has to pay for the expenses," he says.  The route that he works runs from the central plaza to the office of public records.  His wife monitors the arrival of the cars that they have in their fleet, and in this way they make a good team for their business.  However, since he has a license to drive trucks, he works as a driver transporting heavy cargo throughout the country.  He says that soon he will travel to Moya to transport wheat, where they pay him very well, as the transportation of food products requires a lot of responsibility.  This is his 19th loan with MFP, and he feels happy, because he has the capital he needs to improve his business, and therefore his quality of life.  In addition, he enjoys being a member of his communal bank, because the members are hardworking and supportive people.  Upon receiving your support, Rufo will use this loan to pay for repairs to his vehicle, which was in a collision.

loans.use: to take his vehicle to an auto body shop to get it repaired

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es: Yeny, de 25 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 5 años, junto a Enrique, su esposo. Ambos tienen una hija: Lesly, a la que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Huertas. Desde hace 4 años, despierta todas las mañanas en busca de paja y ramas secas, pues tiene que hornear las tejas y ladrillos que prepara. Gusta mucho de su trabajo, sobre todo por que junto a su esposo, afrontan los problemas de su negocio y también disfrutan de los aciertos. Al día realiza un promedio de 400 a 600 unidades de ladrillos. Eso le gusta mucho sobre todo porque, puede tener más de una hornada al mes, quiere decir 12 millares. Pero confiesa, muy ofuscada; que la temporada donde tiene menos ingresos es en invierno, ya que las lluvias impiden que seque los ladrillos, su producción se reduce a la mitad. Es entonces que ella aprovecha esa oportunidad para poder sembrar en su terreno agrícola, según cuenta sus sembríos constan de maíz, alverja y poco de papa, los que en cada cosecha, comercializa a la ciudad de Jauja, donde se realiza las ferias dominicales. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Yeny de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los ladrillos y tejas.
texts.en:
Yeny is a 25 year old hard-working woman. She has lived for 5 years with her husband Enrique. Together they have a daughter, Lesly, whom they care for in their own house located in the town of Huertas. 

Beginning 4 years ago, Yeny wakes up every morning in search of straw and dry sticks because she has to bake the tiles and bricks that she prepares. She enjoys her job very much, above all because together with her husband they face their business problems and also enjoy the successes. 

Yeny makes a daily average of 400 to 600 bricks. She likes this a lot because she can have more than one batch per month, which means 12 thousand bricks. But she confesses, very confused, that the season during which she has the least income is winter, when the rains impede the drying of the bricks and her production reduces to half. It is during this time that Yeny takes advantage of the opportunity to seed her agricultural land, which consists of corn, peas, and some potatoes. In each harvest, she sells these crops in the city of Jauja, where there are Sunday markets. 

This is Yeny's first loan with MFP, and she is happy because she has the capital necessary to improve her business and thus her quality of life. In addition, she likes belonging to the association because its members are caring and hard-working. Upon receiving this support, Yeny will invest the requested money in the purchase of raw materials for making bricks and tiles.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making bricks and tiles.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica, de 32 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Hugo, su esposo desde hace 14 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. Ella trabaja en la escuela más reconocida de su localidad, es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque, vive en la misma institución, en donde cuida las instalaciones, ya tiene 8 años dedicándose a esta labor, y ya todos la conocen sobre todo porque es una mujer muy inteligente y siempre busca maneras novedosas de vender sus alimentos. Pero como no le gusta descansar, también sale todos los fines de semana a la feria de su ciudad, donde vende productos de temporada como juguetes y en épocas escolares, libros, cuadernos, lapiceros y demás útiles de escritorio. Ahora ella desea instalar un pequeño restaurante en su negocio, le falta muy poco, ya comenzó comprando algunos instrumentos como platos, cucharas y demás. Ella pertenece aún grupo solidario y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Angélica de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos alimenticios para su tienda.
texts.en: Angélica, 32, is a hardworking woman who lives with Hugo, her husband of 14 years.  Together they have 4 children that they care for in their own home, located in the town of Pampas.  Angélica works in the most well-known school in her area.  She is a hardworking woman, most of all because she lives on the grounds of the school, where she also serves as a caretaker.  She has been doing this work for 8 years, and now everyone knows her and knows her to be a very intelligent woman who is always seeking new ways to sell her food.  However, since she doesn't like to rest, she also goes out on the weekends to the market in her city where she sells seasonal products such as toys and, during the school year, books, notebooks, pens and other stationery supplies.  Now she wants to add a small eatery to her business.  She doesn't need much, because she already started buying some of the things she needs, such as plates, spoons and other items.  She is still a member in her communal bank, and this is their 8th loan cycle with MFP, where she feels very pleased to be able to develop her businesses with the support of all of you.  In addition, she promises to deliver all of her payments in a punctual manner, because she has always been a hardworking and honest person.  Once she receives your support, Angelica will invest the money in the purchase of food products for her store.

loans.use: to buy food products to stock her store

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 42 años es un hombre trabajador y responsable. Vive solo en la localidad de Matahuasi, pero su vida gira entorno de sus 2 hijos: Jonatán y Cristian  a quienes educa. Desde muy joven comenzó con el trabajo en construcción, su principal ingreso económico. Cuenta que siempre fue responsable, a los 12 años trabajó como marino en una embarcación donde desarrolló su habilidad de pescador, con el pasó de tiempo aprendió a ser perforista, y es que, Jorge aprendió a desarrollar mil oficios. El trabajo de perforista, es lo que más le gustó, cuenta que existen días en las que no tiene mucho trabajo en construcción, ahí aprovecha para poder realizar algunos trabajos a los vecinos, quienes conocen de su capacidad. Aparte de ello, realizó la mayoría de las casas de su localidad, también trabajos para el estado peruano, con licitaciones en las que tiene que invertir gran cantidad de dinero. “Mi modalidad es: a todo costo, es decir terminó la construcción de las viviendas negocios o centros recreativos, etc. Cuando, ya están listos, todavía cobro el total de dinero”. Ahora Desea recompensar todo el tiempo que perdió en la educación de sus hijos, pues siempre trabajó y no dejó tiempo para otras actividades muy importantes. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida.
